  • NETFLIX IS WORKING ON GAMERTAGS

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/27/23324515/netflix-gamertags-game-handles-mobile-gaming-community

    08/28/2022, 04:10

    68.42% Shortened!

    Netflix gave me the option to create and manage the game handle associated with my particular Netflix profile in both games

    Just like creating your gamertag (or public-facing username on any other gaming platform), your game handle must be unique, which Netflix will automatically check once you input the name of your choice

    “Your game handle is a unique public name for playing games on Netflix,” the in-app text reads when first creating your handle

    You can change your game handle at anytime.” After tapping into the “Learn More” menu, Netflix explains that you can use game handles when inviting and playing with other members

    Netflix spokesperson Kumiko Hidaka confirmed to The Verge that Netflix started rolling out game handles in select titles last month, including Into the Breach, Bowling Ballers, Heads Up!, and Mahjong Solitaire

    It’s not clear if and when Netflix plans on rolling out game handles to more of its games, though

    ['experience', 'game', 'netflix', 'handle', 'user']

  • WIRELESS ANDROID AUTO WITH GOOGLE MAPS IS TERRIBLE

    https://www.androidauthority.com/wireless-android-auto-maps-3200344/

    08/28/2022, 02:10

    91.3% Shortened!

    Surely, if anything should work well with a wireless Auto system, it would be Maps, right? Getting started? How to connect Android Auto to your car As any Android Auto user will know, you can’t use the phone version of Google Maps while you are using the Android Auto version

    And it’s not like Android Auto doesn’t know you’re parked

    It’s only logical that she would also connect her own phone wirelessly to Android Auto

    If I’m driving and want access to my phone but her phone auto-connects first, there is no way to tell Android Auto to drop that connection and move over to mine

    Once Auto realizes she’s “gone,” it can take multiple minutes for it to then auto-connect to my phone

    Sometimes it doesn’t connect at all! When that happens, we actually need to turn the car off, open the car door, close it, restart the car, and wait for Auto to connect to my phone

    ['android', 'auto', 'car', 'phone', 'use']

    Surely, if anything should work well with a wireless Auto system, it would be Maps, right? Getting started? How to connect Android Auto to your car As any Android Auto user will know, you can’t use the phone version of Google Maps while you are using the Android Auto version

    And it’s not like Android Auto doesn’t know you’re parked

    It’s only logical that she would also connect her own phone wirelessly to Android Auto

    If I’m driving and want access to my phone but her phone auto-connects first, there is no way to tell Android Auto to drop that connection and move over to mine

    Once Auto realizes she’s “gone,” it can take multiple minutes for it to then auto-connect to my phone

    Sometimes it doesn’t connect at all! When that happens, we actually need to turn the car off, open the car door, close it, restart the car, and wait for Auto to connect to my phone

    ['android', 'auto', 'car', 'phone', 'use']

  • GOOGLE OPENS THE DOOR FOR ANDROID APPS THAT WORK ACROSS ALL KINDS OF DEVICES

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/27/23324635/google-cross-device-android-apps-sdk-windows-ios-phones-tablets

    08/28/2022, 02:10

    60.0% Shortened!

    In a blog post, Google explains that it’s launching a new cross-device software development kit (SDK) that contains the tools developers need to make their apps play nice across Android devices, and, eventually non-Android phones, tablets, TVs, cars, and more

    According to Google, its cross-device SDK uses Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and ultra-wideband to deliver multi-device connectivity

    Google describes various use cases for its cross-device SDK on its documentation page, and it looks like it could come in handy in many scenarios

    In April, Esper’s Mishaal Rahman spotted an upcoming Nearby Share update that could let you quickly share files across the devices that you’re signed into Google with

    The cross-device toolkit is currently available in a developer preview and only works with Android phones and tablets for now

    Google eventually wants to extend support to “other Android surfaces and non-Android OSs,” including iOS and Windows, but there’s no word on when this will happen

    ['device', 'google', 'developer', 'android', 'apps']

    In a blog post, Google explains that it’s launching a new cross-device software development kit (SDK) that contains the tools developers need to make their apps play nice across Android devices, and, eventually non-Android phones, tablets, TVs, cars, and more

    According to Google, its cross-device SDK uses Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and ultra-wideband to deliver multi-device connectivity

    Google describes various use cases for its cross-device SDK on its documentation page, and it looks like it could come in handy in many scenarios

    In April, Esper’s Mishaal Rahman spotted an upcoming Nearby Share update that could let you quickly share files across the devices that you’re signed into Google with

    The cross-device toolkit is currently available in a developer preview and only works with Android phones and tablets for now

    Google eventually wants to extend support to “other Android surfaces and non-Android OSs,” including iOS and Windows, but there’s no word on when this will happen

    ['device', 'google', 'developer', 'android', 'apps']



  • SNAPDRAGON 6 GEN 1'S SPECS SHEET LEAKED - GSMARENA.COM NEWS

    https://www.gsmarena.com/qualcomm_snapdragon_6_gen_1_full_specs-news-55552.php

    08/28/2022, 01:10

    60.0% Shortened!

    Qualcomm has launched three chipsets based on the 4nm manufacturing process under the new naming scheme until now - Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1, and Snapdragon 7 Gen 1

    Thanks to reliable leakster Evan Blass, we now know the company will also launch a Snapdragon 6 series chip with the same naming convention, called Snapdragon 6 Gen 1

    The Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 SoC consists of a Kryo CPU clocked at up to 2.2GHz, but we don't know the number of cores

    The smartphones powered by the Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 will also be able to record 4K HDR videos at 30 FPS and slow-mo videos at 240 FPS

    Snapdragon 6 Gen 1's specs There's no word from Qualcomm about the Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 yet, but we might see it go official alongside the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 flagship chip at this year's Snapdragon Summit, which will be hosted in Hawaii between November 15-17

    Although we could also see Qualcomm announce it before the 8 Gen 2

    ['qualcomm', 'snapdragon', 'gen', 'blass', 'also']

    Qualcomm has launched three chipsets based on the 4nm manufacturing process under the new naming scheme until now - Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1, and Snapdragon 7 Gen 1

    Thanks to reliable leakster Evan Blass, we now know the company will also launch a Snapdragon 6 series chip with the same naming convention, called Snapdragon 6 Gen 1

    The Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 SoC consists of a Kryo CPU clocked at up to 2.2GHz, but we don't know the number of cores

    The smartphones powered by the Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 will also be able to record 4K HDR videos at 30 FPS and slow-mo videos at 240 FPS

    Although we could also see Qualcomm announce it before the 8 Gen 2

  • XBOX GAME PASS "FRIENDS & FAMILY" LEAK SUGGESTS YOU CAN SHARE WITH FRIENDS

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/27/23324623/microsoft-xbox-game-pass-friends-family-subscription-leak

    08/28/2022, 00:10

    45.45% Shortened!

    Microsoft started testing its Xbox Game Pass family plan in Ireland and Colombia earlier this month, and now Twitter leaker Aggiornamenti Lumia has spotted “Game Pass Friends & Family” branding

    The leak could mean Microsoft isn’t thinking about restricting Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers to sharing their benefits with just immediate family members

    Microsoft doesn’t currently mention a family restriction in its test plan, only that people need to be in the same country

    Neither includes online multiplayer capabilities, but you can upgrade to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate for $14.99, and this unlocks Game Pass for console, PC, EA Play access, and online multiplayer

    This new family plan, that will now likely be branded Xbox Game Pass Friends & Family, will include all the same Xbox Game Pass Ultimate benefits for four other friends or family members

    That includes access to Xbox Cloud Gaming, Xbox Live, and even the PC Game Pass versions of games

    ['friend', 'game', 'pas', 'microsoft', 'xbox']

  • GOOGLE PIXEL BUDS PRO: MY 3 FAVORITE AND 3 LEAST FAVORITE FEATURES

    https://www.androidauthority.com/google-pixel-buds-pro-favorite-features-3195744/

    08/27/2022, 23:09

    92.31% Shortened!

    The Pixel Buds Pro will pause the show and switch to my phone to take the call, again without me lifting a finger

    Instead, I have to feel around for how exactly the bud is lodged in my ear, then perform the tap or swipe

    If the bud is angled upward, I also have to change my whole approach

    Trust me, I realize how ridiculous this sounds, but basically, instead of raising my index to tap the bud, I have to raise it higher, then come down to tap the bud

    I love the Pixel Buds Pro’s case

    Google got many things right with the Pixel Buds Pro

    ['google', 'pixel', 'bud', 'pro', 'ear']

  • THAILAND'S YOUNG BADMINTON STAR VITIDSARN TO FACE DANISH SUPERSTAR AXELSEN IN BADMINTON WORLD FINAL

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/08/27/thailand039s-young-badminton-star-vitidsarn-to-face-danish-superstar-axelsen-in-badminton-world-final

    08/27/2022, 22:10

    76.92% Shortened!

    The 21-year-old Vitidsarn beat China's Zhao Junpeng 22-20, 21-6 in their semi-final and then watched Axelsen give another masterclass in his 21-15, 21-17 win over Taiwan's Chou Tien-chen

    Axelsen has lost only one singles match this season and he has not dropped a single game at this week's world championships in Tokyo

    "It definitely felt a bit different from the previous matches." Axelsen had no such problems in his semi-final win over Chou as he moved one win away from a second world title

    Chen beat Taiwan's Tai Tzu-ying 15-21, 21-14, 21-18 to become the first Chinese woman to reach a world final since 2016

    "I want to win for the China team but the top players from all over the world are doing well in women's singles at the moment and it wouldn't be a surprise if anyone won," said Chen, who also beat Tai in last year's Tokyo Olympics final

    "I'm just doing my best to win the title." Yamaguchi beat South Korea's An Se-young 21-19, 21-12 to advance to the final for the second year running

    08/27/2022, 22:09

    76.0% Shortened!

    Your guide to a better future Apple's next iPhone is likely debuting on Sept

    7 event is very likely to be the day that Apple reveals the rumored iPhone 14 line

    After introducing the notch on the iPhone X back in 2017, Apple could finally ditch it this year -- though apparently only on the Pro models

    Instead of lighting up your entire display like your lock screen does, an always-on display only activates a portion of the screen to save power.  Apple didn't make any price changes between the iPhone 12 and iPhone 13 lineup, but Wedbush analyst Dan Ives expects a price hike for iPhone 14 pro models to the tune of $100

    Currently, the iPhone 13 Pro starts at $999 and the iPhone 13 Pro Max starts at $1,099.  That's backed up by Kuo, who recently said he expects the average selling price of the iPhone 14 lineup to increase

    Apple's last two iPhone lineups have featured the same 6.1-inch size for the base model, going up to 6.7 inches for the Pro Max

    ['well', 'apple', 'iphone', 'rumor', 'camera']

  • SECOND ARMOURED VEHICLE STALLS AFTER MERDEKA REHEARSAL | FREE MALAYSIA TODAY

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/27/second-armoured-vehicle-stalls-after-merdeka-rehearsal/

    08/27/2022, 21:10

    57.14% Shortened!

    According to an army statement today, the PT-91M Pendekar had just finished taking part in the parade and was on its way to the vehicle parking area before stopping suddenly due to engine problems at 10.30am

    It was towed away at 11am to another parking area at the National Museum for repairs

    The second incident occurred today at 11.26am at the National Museum, according to the army statement, Bernama reported

    The army statement said 129 army vehicles were involved in the 2022 National Day parade

    “The Malaysian army apologises over these two incidents,” the statement said

    It said a recovery team, together with the Kembalik (military tow truck), would be on standby to tow any army vehicle that stalls to avoid traffic jams

    ['army', 'vehicle', 'national', 'parade', 'today']

    08/27/2022, 21:09

    50.0% Shortened!

    Google Samsung Mobile hardware Android Rumors

    As per a report from GalaxyClub, Google and Samsung are already working on a third-generation Tensor SoC, which should power next year's Pixel 8 lineup

    On the one hand, it's no surprise that Google and Samsung will continue to work on their joint venture but on the other, it's not the first time Google has killed a project or two

    After all, the first-generation Tensor chipset isn't exactly on par with the competition from Qualcomm and Apple

    The Tensor's advantage, however, is that Google has the freedom to tailor the SoC to its needs

    Unfortunately, the leak doesn't go into details so aside from the Tensor 3's S5P9865 model number and the fact that it's being tested on a developer board codenamed "Ripcurrent", there's nothing else we can work with

    ['google', 'samsung', 'mobile', 'android', 'rumor']

  • DESTINY 2 KING'S FALL RAID GOLGOROTH ENCOUNTER GUIDE

    https://www.sportskeeda.com/esports/destiny-2-king-s-fall-raid-golgoroth-encounter-guide

    08/27/2022, 20:48

    72.73% Shortened!

    The Golgoroth encounter in Destiny 2 is one of them

    Once it is triggered, one Guardian will have to shoot Golgoroth in the back, following which the ugly Hive Ogre will fix its gaze on them

    The large yellow sack on Golgoroth's back is the target that a Guardian will need to shoot to receive the Golgoroth's Gaze debuff

    With the Gaze debuff on one Guardian, Golgoroth will expose its midriff, revealing a weak spot

    Furthermore, this debuff can be transferred from one Guardian to another

    Whichever Guardian shoots Golgoroth in the back will receive the Gaze debuff

    ['one', 'guardian', 'golgoroth', 'encounter', 'damage']

    Players must keep in mind that they will have to complete part 3 of the Aranyaka World Quest for the NPC to appear near the Tree of Dream

    Here is everything players need to know about obtaining all the Sumeru craftable weapons

    Much like Inazuma, players can collect blueprints for five craftable weapons in Sumeru

    The special currency "Stories of You and the Aranara" can be exchanged with Aravinay who will be located near the Tree of Dreams in Vanarana

    Fortunately, Genshin Impact players can use the crafting bench to craft Midlander Billets

    Lastly, Genshin Impact players will require 50 Crystal Chunk, 50 White Iron Chunk, and 500 Mora to forge the desired craftable weapon

  • RAFIZI: PAKATAN TO ANNOUNCE GE15 SEATS, PRELIMINARY LIST OF CANDIDATES IN A MONTH’S TIME

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/27/rafizi-pakatan-to-announce-ge15-seats-preliminary-list-of-candidates-in-a-months-time/25069

    08/27/2022, 18:13

    45.45% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise SHAH ALAM, Aug 27 — PKR deputy president Rafizi Ramli today said that Pakatan Harapan (PH) would be announcing the seats that the coalition plans to contest during the 15th general election (GE15) in a month’s time

    When delivering his speech at PKR’s Election Convention here, he said that PH would also prepare a preliminary list of candidates for those seats, in a show of strength to the public

    “In a month’s time, we will shortlist our candidates and settle all negotiations on the party’s seats,” he said in his speech

    He also chided former party compatriot Datuk Seri Azmin Ali, reminding delegates at the convention to refrain from betraying the party’s ideals and keep their intentions pure

    The PKR Election Convention saw over 3,500 delegates from across Malaysia attending the rally

    Chants of “Reformasi”, “Hidup Anwar” and “Lawan Tetap Lawan” rang throughout the hall for most of the afternoon, lifting the spirit among PKR delegates.

    ['pkr', 'say', 'would', 'seat', 'election']

  • MUHYIDDIN TAUNTS BN OVER PUSH FOR SNAP POLLS

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/27/muhyiddin-taunts-bn-over-push-for-snap-polls/

    08/27/2022, 18:10

    70.0% Shortened!

    Stating that he has received reports of the public’s “deteriorating trust in BN”, Muhyiddin said that he read with great interest a recent statement by Umno president (Ahmad Zahid Hamidi) that GE15 — which can be held as late as mid-September 2023 — should be held this year

    “(He said) if BN waits until next year, they may lose,” Muhyiddin said in his opening speech at the PN Convention here

    Prime Minister Ismail Sabri Yaakob yesterday played down speculation that the decision to bring the tabling of Budget 2023 forward by three weeks was linked to GE15, which is expected by many to be held this year

    The Umno vice-president pointed out that previous administrations had tabled the annual federal budget as early as September in the past

    Touching on Budget 2023, Muhyiddin said it was likely that Parliament will be dissolved the day after it is tabled, that is on Oct 8

    “Abide by the court’s decision.” It is believed that Muhyiddin was referring to criticism by Umno leaders of the Federal Court’s decision to uphold former prime minister Najib Razak’s SRC International conviction and sentence on Tuesday

    ['muhyiddin', 'ge15', 'say', 'umno', 'president']

    Notably, there will be no 5.4-inch "‌iPhone 14‌ mini" as the iPhone 12 mini and iPhone 13 mini have seen lackluster sales

    Three new Apple Watch models are also expected, including the Apple Watch Series 8, the second-generation ‌Apple Watch SE‌, and a new "Pro" Apple Watch model

    Kien Keat and partner Tan Boon Heong were the last Malaysian pair to reach the final of the major event 12 years ago but they were beaten by four-time champions Cai Yun-Fu Haifeng in Paris for the title

    Hendra, 38, and Ahsan, 35 next month, are possibly one of the oldest pairs to reach the final and Kien Keat urged Aaron, 25, and Wooi Yik, 27, to take advantage of the age factor

    But Hendra is 38 while Ahsan is 35 and Aaron-Wooi Yik should take the age factor to their advantage

    Just play it cool," said Kien Keat.

    But that wasn't the end of the story

    The A80 Supra won the first round after a decider that ended in a photo finish

    However, with the AWD traction advantage and the impeccable skill of the Skyline GT-R's driver, the Nissan totally destroyed the Toyota when starting from a dig – and that was despite the Supra's huge power and weight advantages

  • HADI EXHORTS PERIKATAN PARTIES TO WIN GE15 AND REMOVE ‘BACKDOOR’ STAIN AS COALITION MOOTS MUHYIDDIN AS ITS PM CANDIDATE AGAIN

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/27/hadi-exhorts-perikatan-parties-to-win-ge15-and-remove-backdoor-stain-as-coalition-moots-muhyiddin-as-its-pm-candidate-again/25052

    08/27/2022, 15:13

    53.85% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise SERDANG, Aug 27 — The five component parties that make up Perikatan Nasional (PN) today nominated chairman Tan Sri Muhyiddin Yassin as their prime ministerial candidate should the co-ruling coalition win the 15th general election

    Gerakan president Datuk Dominic Lau Hoe Chai called on the 1,300 delegates attending the PN convention here to work together so Muhyiddin could be prime minister again

    “Let’s gather all our strength from ministers to all members of the coalition to make Tan Sri Muhyiddin Yassin the 10th prime minister of Malaysia,” he said in his speech at the convention, which also marks PN’s second anniversary since being formed in 2020

    “We have to make Muhyiddin as the head of the government again and Perikatan Nasional must helm the country again without other influence,” he said

    “We take over to strengthen the government, establish PN and make Muhyiddin become PM,” he said in his speech

    In his opening speech this morning, Muhyiddin had confidently forecasted that the Umno-led Barisan Nasional — which it partnered to form the federal government last year under Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob — will lose in the coming GE regardless of when it will be held.

    ['party', 'make', 'muhyiddin', 'prime', 'coalition']

    ADOR, the agency of NewJeans, has shared an explanation regarding the controversy over the group’s song “Cookie.” “Cookie” is one of the four tracks of their first EP, and fans pointed out that it isn’t an appropriate song for minors to sing because of the sexual connotations

    And that support has been incredibly uplifting for NewJeans and everyone here at ADOR

    The underlying message of the song is the value of NewJeans’ attempt to make new and original music

    That’s why, even though we produce NewJeans’ music and all the related content for everyone to enjoy, it “ain’t for free” and can only be found at our place ADOR, pointing listeners toward the whole message the group ultimately aims to convey through their debut album

    The ADOR team didn’t take any issue with the lyrics to “Cookie” when we were making the album because our vision for original and wholesome music was crystal clear to us

    Everyone at ADOR will do their best going forward to prevent any further misunderstanding

    He is a stickler for common sense, and because of his strong convictions in a reality where common sense doesn’t always work, he somehow becomes the center of conflict

    As the assistant manager who is always on top of her work, Cha Na Rae (Go Sung Hee) poses with a dazzling smile

    More characters featured in the photo are Ki Sung Nam (Baek Hyun Jin), who always has mixed coffee he took from the office pantry in his jacket, Gi Sung Nam (Heo Jung Do), who carries a keyboard to work for games, and Cha Wa Wa (Jeon Suk Chan), who always takes care of his scalp due to losing hair every day

    Each of the team members have a distinct personality, but what they have in common is that they want to leave the department

    The text on the poster depicts their greatest wish, saying, “Our wish is to move to a different department instead of getting a promotion!” “Gaus Electronics” will premiere on September 30

    ['poster', 'drama', 'office', 'department', 'common']

    Olleh TV revealed the main poster of their upcoming drama! Webtoon-based drama “Gaus Electronics” (literal title) is a comedy drama which will cover the struggles that all office workers can relate to as well as office romance and friendships

    He is a stickler for common sense, and because of his strong convictions in a reality where common sense doesn’t always work, he somehow becomes the center of conflict

    As the assistant manager who is always on top of her work, Cha Na Rae (Go Sung Hee) poses with a dazzling smile

    More characters featured in the photo are Ki Sung Nam (Baek Hyun Jin), who always has mixed coffee he took from the office pantry in his jacket, Gi Sung Nam (Heo Jung Do), who carries a keyboard to work for games, and Cha Wa Wa (Jeon Suk Chan), who always takes care of his scalp due to losing hair every day

  • ANWAR SAYS JAIL LIKELY END OF NAJIB’S POLITICAL CAREER, BUT WILL BOOST PAKATAN’S CHANCES IN GE15

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/27/anwar-says-jail-likely-end-of-najibs-political-career-but-will-boost-pakatans-chances-in-ge15/25044

    08/27/2022, 14:12

    71.43% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 27 — This week’s Federal Court ruling that sent former prime minister Datuk Seri Mohd Najib Razak to jail will give Pakatan Harapan (PH) the fillip at the next general election, Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim said

    Najib began serving time in jail last Tuesday

    Anwar told Bloomberg that he believes Ismail Sabri would rather call an election later than sooner

    But whether or not Najib will apply for a royal pardon, and get one, remains unclear

    The King was petitioned to pardon Anwar after he was jailed in 2015, but it was rejected

    The PH chief told Bloomberg that the 15th general election would be his last bid for the prime ministership

    ['najib', 'election', 'anwar', 'say', 'would']

    Bersih condemns those who unashamedly instructed Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri to seek pardon for Najib and early dissolution of Parliament

    He must remember his mandate comes from the Parliament, and not from Umno

    This would start a new constitutional convention of ‘fixed term parliament’

    With ‘fixed term parliament’, election date would be largely fixed

    This would contribute to political stability by discouraging political adventurism and short-term calculations

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/27/4-killed-12-injured-in-4-vehicle-pile-up-on-east-coast-highway/

    08/27/2022, 11:15

    45.45% Shortened!

    Pahang fire and rescue department public relations officer Zulfadli Zakaria said the vehicles involved were a container lorry, Proton Exora, Proton Waja and a tow truck

    He said the dead were an elderly couple and a youth travelling in the Proton Exora, and the tow truck driver but their identities were not known yet

    “The fire and rescue department received an emergency call at 3.26am regarding the accident

    The container lorry is believed to have skidded and crashed into the truck which was in the process of towing the Proton Exora that had broken down earlier on the highway

    “The Proton Waja was also said to be on the roadside at the time

    The impact of the crash sent the Proton Exora plunging into a 40-foot-deep ravine,” he said in a statement here

  • HUAWEI'S PROFITS COLLAPSE AS US SANCTIONS BITE

    https://asiatimes.com/2022/08/huaweis-profits-collapse-as-us-sanctions-bite/

    08/27/2022, 11:10

    87.23% Shortened!

    It means Huawei’s net profit fell by 51.97% to 15.1 billion yuan for the period

    He said Huawei should consider downsizing its smart car business

    In the fourth quarter of 2020, Huawei slowed its smartphone production

    In 2019, Huawei, together with Honor, was the No 1 smartphone maker in China with a market share of 26.5%, according to the industry research group Canalys.  Last year, Huawei’s market share fell to just 9.3% while Honor had a 10.4% market share, according to research group Cinno

    On August 12 this year, Huawei reported a 5.8% decline in overall sales to 301.6 billion yuan ($43.9 billion) for the first half of this year from a year ago

    Revenue of the company’s carrier business grew 4% to 142.7 billion yuan while that of enterprise business, which includes cloud and business services, increased 28% to 54.7 billion yuan

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/27/police-report-lodged-over-leaked-rosmah-judgment/

    08/27/2022, 10:15

    57.14% Shortened!

    “Thus, a police report has been lodged in relation to the reports on the website in question,” it said, referring to a document said to be a copy of a judgment delivering a guilty verdict against Rosmah

    Yesterday, the police urged the public to lodge reports related to an alleged leak of Rosmah’s court ruling on her corruption trial involving the Sarawak solar project

    The purported leak came less than a week after another leak allegedly of the Federal Court ruling of Rosmah’s husband Najib Razak’s SRC International case appeal ahead of the decision by the apex court on Aug 23

    Rosmah was charged with three counts of corruption linked to the RM1.25 billion Sarawak rural schools’ solar energy project

    High Court judge Zaini Mazlan is scheduled to deliver his decision on Rosmah’s corruption trial at 9am on Sept 1

    ['court', 'lodge', 'police', 'report', 'allege']



  • AVENUE FOR REVIEW OF THE FEDERAL COURT’S OWN DECISIONS SHOULD NOT BE ABUSED — HAFIZ HASSAN

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/what-you-think/2022/08/27/avenue-for-review-of-the-federal-courts-own-decisions-should-not-be-abused-hafiz-hassan/25011

    08/27/2022, 10:13

    75.0% Shortened!

    This comes under an exercise of the apex court’s inherent power via Rule 137 of the Rules of the Federal Court 1995

    It must also be reminded that a review under Rule 137 “should not bear any semblance to judicial review” in the strict sense of Order 53 of the Rules Court 2012

    (j) Where the Federal Court allows an appeal which should have been consequentially dismissed because it accepted the concurrent findings of the High Court and Court of Appeal (Joceline Tan Poh Choo & Ors v V Muthusamy [2007])

    The Asean Security case was referred to by the Federal Court recently in the case of Golden Star & Ors v Ling Peek Hoe & Ors [2021] when the apex court took time to discuss two applications for review under Rule 137 (three applications in fact, the first having been withdrawn)

    Review under Rule 137 cannot apply where a decision of the Federal Court is only questioned, whether in law or on the facts of the case

    The avenue for review under Rule 137 should not be abused

    ['federal', 'court', 'review', 'decision', 'rule']

    This comes under an exercise of the apex court’s inherent power via Rule 137 of the Rules of the Federal Court 1995

    It must also be reminded that a review under Rule 137 “should not bear any semblance to judicial review” in the strict sense of Order 53 of the Rules Court 2012

    (j) Where the Federal Court allows an appeal which should have been consequentially dismissed because it accepted the concurrent findings of the High Court and Court of Appeal (Joceline Tan Poh Choo & Ors v V Muthusamy [2007])

    The Asean Security case was referred to by the Federal Court recently in the case of Golden Star & Ors v Ling Peek Hoe & Ors [2021] when the apex court took time to discuss two applications for review under Rule 137 (three applications in fact, the first having been withdrawn)

    Review under Rule 137 cannot apply where a decision of the Federal Court is only questioned, whether in law or on the facts of the case

    The avenue for review under Rule 137 should not be abused

    ['federal', 'court', 'review', 'decision', 'rule']



  • REAL XPERIA 5 IV OR XPERIA COMPACT GUEST STARS IN SONY'S LATEST PROMO TEASERS

    https://www.notebookcheck.net/Real-Xperia-5-IV-or-Xperia-Compact-guest-stars-in-Sony-s-latest-promo-teasers.643264.0.html

    08/27/2022, 10:10

    57.14% Shortened!

    With the argument that a 6-inch smartphone cannot really be considered “compact” and Sony using the tagline “Go compact” in its new teasers, it could be argued that an unexpected compact phone is about to be launched.

    Interestingly, the Sony Xperia 5 IV or Xperia Compact in the clip appears to have a light gold colorway, although there is nothing else that is too discernible about the device’s showing here.

    Fortunately, the new Sony Xperia is much less shy in the next clip, which also has Burns talking about her recording experiences with the smartphone

    In addition, the potential Sony Xperia 5 IV here has a slightly different, but still distinctive and appealing, shape than that of the Xperia 5 III.

    With the Xperia 5 IV expected to have a 6-inch display, there has been some call for Sony to produce what could be considered an actual compact smartphone akin to something like the iPhone 13 mini, which offered a 5.4-inch diagonal for its screen

    There are certainly pointers that this particular Xperia device being teased now could end up being a new Xperia Compact, perhaps even a distant successor to 2018’s Sony Xperia XZ2 Compact that packed a powerful punch behind a 5.0-inch display

    ['sony', 'new', 'smartphone', 'xperia', 'could']

    Fortunately, the new Sony Xperia is much less shy in the next clip, which also has Burns talking about her recording experiences with the smartphone

    In addition, the potential Sony Xperia 5 IV here has a slightly different, but still distinctive and appealing, shape than that of the Xperia 5 III.

    There are certainly pointers that this particular Xperia device being teased now could end up being a new Xperia Compact, perhaps even a distant successor to 2018’s Sony Xperia XZ2 Compact that packed a powerful punch behind a 5.0-inch display

  • FÁBIO CARVALHO COULD BE ABOUT TO UNLEASH £77M LIVERPOOL TRIO AND TRANSFORM JÜRGEN KLOPP PLAN

    https://www.liverpool.com/liverpool-fc-news/features/liverpool-fabio-carvalho-jurgen-klopp-24850519

    08/27/2022, 10:09

    60.0% Shortened!

    Liverpool need to start Fábio Carvalho at Anfield against Bournemouth

    A more fundamental change, however, could be in store

    £5m signing Fábio Carvalho is simply a must against Bournemouth — a team he started against last season for Fulham in the Championship — and he could really help Liverpool move things around

    Alongside him could sit Jordan Henderson in a midfield two — more than enough against Bournemouth, particularly at home

    In front of that duo could be an attacking three of Carvalho, Luis Díaz and Elliott

    Bringing Carvalho into the side is not a drastic change for Klopp to make for Bournemouth, and given that is the case, a move to a proper 4-2-3-1 — rather than a 4-3-3 where the midfield balance is not quite right — makes perfect sense

    ['liverpool', 'carvalho', 'bournemouth', 'could', 'season']

  • EARLY BUDGET MEANS ELECTIONS BEFORE MONSOON SEASON, SAY ANALYSTS

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/27/early-budget-means-elections-before-monsoon-season-say-analysts/

    08/27/2022, 08:15

    57.14% Shortened!

    The budget is to be tabled on Oct 7, instead of Oct 28, with the Dewan Rakyat to meet on Oct 3

    Another analyst, Azmi Hassan of Akademi Nusantara, said he believed Parliament would be dissolved soon after the budget was tabled, especially if the budget is not passed by the Dewan Rakyat

    By constitutional convention, a government falls if the budget is not approved

    Azmi said Prime Minister Ismail Sabri Yaakob would then seek to dissolve Parliament

    “Ismail will say he has no choice,” Azmi told FMT

    Jeniri said it was likely that Parliament would be dissolved even if the budget was approved

  • JURGEN KLOPP MUST BREAK A SIX-YEAR TREND THAT POSES MAJOR THREAT TO LIVERPOOL SEASON

    https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/jurgen-klopp-trend-liverpool-season-24845374

    08/27/2022, 08:09

    79.31% Shortened!

    They won 91 times and averaged 2.44 points per game

    This equates to 93 over a 38-match campaign

    With four-or-more men out, they have played 110 fixtures but only averaged 1.95 points per game, or 74 for a full season

    The problem for Klopp is that his current squad is well stocked with many of the most injury-hit players Liverpool have employed during his tenure

    Across the last six years, a Liverpool player has made an average of 3.9 appearances for each game they have missed through injury

    Liverpool have averaged 8.7 injured players per league match this season and they’re yet to put three points on the board

    ['liverpool', 'klopp', 'injury', 'player', 'season']

    Liverpool have been linked with a transfer move for a £45m-rated Valencia midfielder

    Most are probably more than one of the above too

    Marca (via HITC) have reported that Paris Saint-Germain may look to sign Soler if they are unable to prise Fabián Ruiz – himself a rumoured Liverpool target – away from Napoli

    At 25 years of age, Soler would address the mid-20s void that currently looms large in the Liverpool midfield

    But would he be a sensible addition? Many of his strengths, at least in his numbers, are in areas in which Liverpool don’t lack for options

    If the transfer analysts at Liverpool determine that Soler does have similar skills to Wijnaldum, though, that might just do it.

    ['liverpool', 'could', 'red', 'would', 'soler']



  • SAMSUNG ISSUES RARE UPDATE TO OLD GALAXY PHONES TO IMPROVE GPS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/tech/tech-news/2022/08/27/samsung-issues-rare-update-to-old-galaxy-phones-to-improve-gps

    08/27/2022, 08:09

    66.67% Shortened!

    The Samsung Galaxy S7, now a good six years old, is among the older phones now being given an unexpected software update

    The reason for the update appears to be the GPS module in all phones, which needs a fix to be be able to continue correctly identifying the phone's location

    According to Samsung blog SamMobile, the update is set to be offered to some 500 million old phones

    It's impossible to tell how many millions will actually install this update

    Updates are rolling out for Galaxy models S5 Neo, Alpha, S6, S6 Edge, S6 Edge+, A7 (2018), S7, S7 Edge, S8 and S8+

    If you use one of these phones, you're advised to check the settings for a software update

    08/27/2022, 07:09

    53.85% Shortened!

    Southeast Asia Netflix's Resident Evil series has been canceled after one season

    Deadline reports that Netflix will not renew its adaptation of the Capcom survival horror series which premiered its first eight-episodes season on July 14

    Netflix's Resident Evil series told an original story set in the Resident Evil universe

    The series follows two timelines, this New Raccoon City storyline and 14 years later when the T-Virus decimates the human population

    Resident Evil has been adapted numerous times including a series of financially successful films, and the reboot Welcome to Raccoon City

    This is the most recent cancellation over at Netflix, which previously shuttered other adaptations such as the Cowboy Bebop live-action series

    ['netflix', 'resident', 'evil', 'series', 'adaptation']

  • HERE'S HOW TO MAKE YOUR GMAIL INBOX LAYOUT SUIT YOUR WORKFLOW AND TASTE

    https://www.thetechoutlook.com/news/new-release/software-apps/heres-how-to-make-your-gmail-inbox-layout-suit-your-workflow-and-taste/

    08/27/2022

    75.0% Shortened!

    For many people, the default Gmail layout is adequate

    And, while the default Gmail layout is pleasing to the eye, it may not be the most effective way of communicating

    Click Customize beneath Default to see the settings window for the Default layout

    The Primary tab is the only one that cannot be disabled

    Any tab you disable will send an email to the Primary that would typically be grouped with that tab

    In the Primary tab, you can also enable and disable starred messages

    ['default', 'gmail', 'layout', 'tab', 'primary']

    And, while the default Gmail layout is pleasing to the eye, it may not be the most effective way of communicating

    The Primary tab is the only one that cannot be disabled

    Any tab you disable will send an email to the Primary that would typically be grouped with that tab

    In the Primary tab, you can also enable and disable starred messages

    81.82% Shortened!

    Apple improves Spotlight Search with every iteration of iOS, and iOS 16 is no exception

    Accessing the Spotlight Search feature is typically done by swiping down from the Home Screen to bring up the search interface, but Apple in ‌iOS 16‌ decided to add another "Search" button

    You can now find a "Search" option available at the bottom of the ‌Home Screen‌, which can be tapped to enter the Spotlight Search interface

    Spotlight integrates with App Clips, offering up App Clip suggestions when you're in a relevant location

    Apple Watch SE or Apple Watch 7 - which one to get? New iPhones are out

    The next Apple Watch

    ['search', 'spotlight', 'apple', 'io', 'screen']

    Racing seats and cockpit setups take the experience to the next level, and a new setup from Next Level Racing brings a bit of the Ford GT into the gaming room

    NLR and Team Fordzilla, Ford Motor Company's esports division, have created a licensed gaming rig

    It's made of a blue anodized aluminum frame finished in Ford's iconic brand color

    NLR and Team Fordzilla also have a branded racing seat available as the rig and seat are sold separately

    The rig and rails will retail for $799, according to the website, while the seat will cost an extra $499

    If you want to see if you even like racing with such a setup, you can build your own first

  • FINAL FANTASY 16 JAPANESE PLAYERS WANT THE GAME ON PC DUE TO RISING PS5 PRICES

    https://www.playstationlifestyle.net/2022/08/26/final-fantasy-16-japanese-players-pc-ps5-prices/

    08/27/2022, 06:10

    50.0% Shortened!

    The recent PS5 console price increase seems to have gotten Japanese gamers in a flap over the fact they’ve got to pay out more money for the machine to be able to play Final Fantasy 16

    Many are calling for the game to be released on Steam too so they can play it on a PC that they already own

    Final Fantasy XVI is only due to be released on PS5 at the moment

    According to @aitaikimochi on Twitter (thanks GamesRadar), many Japanese players are worried that PS5 console shortages coupled with the roughly 20% increase in the price of the console in their country — now ¥60,478 for the disc version and ¥49,478 for the digital version — means they won’t be able to play Final Fantasy 16 when it is released

    While many were worried they wouldn’t be able to play Final Fantasy 16 on PS5, others started to petition for a Steam version or even a version on Epic Games Store

    They’re hoping that the appearance of Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade on Steam means it is possible for the game to come to PC, although the chances of it arriving on PC at launch are fairly slim

    ['ps5', 'increase', 'play', 'final', 'fantasy']

  • HOW TO RESET THE SAMSUNG GALAXY BUDS 2 PRO

    https://www.digitaltrends.com/home-theater/how-to-reset-the-samsung-buds-2-pro/

    08/27/2022, 06:10

    83.33% Shortened!

    The best way to deal with these issues is to reset the earbuds

    For this step, your Galaxy Buds 2 Pro should already be set up and successfully paired with your device of choice

    Look for an Earbuds Settings or General option to choose

    Confirm that you want to fully reset your Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 Pro

    Once out of the case, the app should detect the earbuds and ask if you want to set them up

    If that doesn’t fix the problem, you need to try to couple the earbuds together again

    ['earbuds', 'galaxy', 'bud', 'pro', 'reset']

    08/27/2022, 06:09

    70.0% Shortened!

    Instagram Meta App iOS Android

    This prompted many people to go into their phone’s Instagram app settings and disable location permissions for the app

    Instagram’s Comms Twitter posted about the viral post, clarifying what Instagram’s policies on location data are

    We don’t share your location with other people

    Instagram CEO Adam Mosseri explains that Instagram device location powers location tag features but the app won’t a user’s location with other people

    Also, you can disable location tagging

  • MY FRIEND WAS ABLE TO UNLOCK MY NEW GOOGLE PHONE WITH HIS FINGERPRINT

    https://www.cnbc.com/2022/08/26/google-pixel-6a-fingerprint-issue-my-friend-unlocked-my-phone.html

    08/27/2022, 05:12

    79.31% Shortened!

    The phone was locked when I handed it to him

    He had placed his finger on the part of the display where the phone scans for fingerprints, and the phone unlocked

    Thankfully, no one else there could unlock my phone

    And two YouTube channels have demonstrated that people could unlock a Pixel 6a even when their fingerprints hadn't been saved in the phone

    People can set up the Pixel 6a without enabling the fingerprint unlock feature, but it's still a popular alternative to a passcode

    While it's rare, I still found it frightening that someone else's fingerprint unlocked my phone

    ['google', 'pixel', 'phone', 'fingerprint', 'unlock']

  • PS5 DISCORD INTEGRATION RELEASE DATE IN “THE COMING MONTHS” – REPORT

    https://www.playstationlifestyle.net/2022/08/26/ps5-discord-integration-release-date-app/

    08/27/2022, 04:10

    50.0% Shortened!

    While Discord integration was technically made available in late January this year on PlayStation platforms, the extent of it was only having Discord friends see what you were playing and letting others see your PSN online ID on your Discord profile

    It’s been underwhelming, to say the least

    Henderson, writing for Exputer, says that the sources providing information on full Discord integration are the same ones that told him about the “PlayStation Pro controller” several months ago

    Progress on the Discord app on PS5 has been reportedly “going very well” for the past several months during the QA phase

    This is great news considering that Microsoft has gotten the jump on Sony on Discord integration, though the method for getting it to work for Xbox consoles through the Xbox Insider program is tricky, to say the least

    Given that Jim Ryan announced Sony’s parternship with Discord back in May 2021 and that Sony has a minority investment in Discord for an undisclosed amount, it’s expected that the PS5 Discord app should be solid

    ['sony', 'ps5', 'discord', 'integration', 'month']

  • GOOGLE BROUGHT BACK DUO (KIND OF) BECAUSE ITS MEET TRANSITION IS SO CONFUSING

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/26/23323541/google-meet-duo-icon-confusion

    08/27/2022, 03:12

    62.5% Shortened!

    Earlier this month, the company rebranded its Duo video chat app as Meet and brought over Meet’s features

    That left the original, to-be-phased-out Meet app with a new “Meet (Original)” name

    With the latest update to the Meet app for Android, Google has brought back the original Duo icon and name as a separate shortcut that appears in the app launcher

    Tapping on Duo opens Google Meet

    Google told 9to5Google and Droid Life that it made this move intentionally so that users would be able to launch Meet by searching for “Duo,” just like they had done before it was rebranded

    Someday we’ll end up with just Messages, Google Chat, and Google Meet after all of this — sadly, without the clean, simple FaceTime alternative that Duo once was — but the road there is proving quite convoluted

    ['duo', 'icon', 'google', 'meet', 'original']

    Earlier this month, the company rebranded its Duo video chat app as Meet and brought over Meet’s features

    That left the original, to-be-phased-out Meet app with a new “Meet (Original)” name

    With the latest update to the Meet app for Android, Google has brought back the original Duo icon and name as a separate shortcut that appears in the app launcher

    Tapping on Duo opens Google Meet

    Google told 9to5Google and Droid Life that it made this move intentionally so that users would be able to launch Meet by searching for “Duo,” just like they had done before it was rebranded

    Someday we’ll end up with just Messages, Google Chat, and Google Meet after all of this — sadly, without the clean, simple FaceTime alternative that Duo once was — but the road there is proving quite convoluted

    ['duo', 'icon', 'google', 'meet', 'original']

  • HP Z32K G3: 32-INCH MONITOR UNVEILED WITH IPS BLACK PANEL AND THUNDERBOLT 4 CONNECTIVITY

    https://www.notebookcheck.net/HP-Z32k-G3-32-inch-monitor-unveiled-with-IPS-Black-Panel-and-Thunderbolt-4-connectivity.643253.0.html

    08/27/2022, 01:09

    50.0% Shortened!

    According to HP, the Z32k G3 is the first monitor to rely on an IPS Black Panel, which should deliver deeper blacks and more vibrant colours than regular IPS panels

    Specifically, IPS Black Panel technology should provide 35% deeper blacks than other IPS panels

    Moreover, HP includes a Thunderbolt 4 port that can recharge a laptop at up to 100 W, as well as providing data and video

    Furthermore, the monitor contains a KVM switch, an Ethernet connection and is backwards compatible with traditional USB Type-C ports

    Alternatively, the monitor offers one DisplayPort and two HDMI ports, should you prefer to use dedicated video outputs

    HP claims that it will start offering the monitor in November 2022, though

    ['z32k', 'monitor', 'ip', 'black', 'panel']

    According to HP, the Z32k G3 is the first monitor to rely on an IPS Black Panel, which should deliver deeper blacks and more vibrant colours than regular IPS panels

    Specifically, IPS Black Panel technology should provide 35% deeper blacks than other IPS panels

    Moreover, HP includes a Thunderbolt 4 port that can recharge a laptop at up to 100 W, as well as providing data and video

    Furthermore, the monitor contains a KVM switch, an Ethernet connection and is backwards compatible with traditional USB Type-C ports

    Alternatively, the monitor offers one DisplayPort and two HDMI ports, should you prefer to use dedicated video outputs

    HP claims that it will start offering the monitor in November 2022, though

    The three-page document was published on the Malaysia Today portal run by Raja Petra, titled; “Rosmah Mansor will be pronounced guilty on 1st September 2022”

    The decision for Rosmah’s solar hybrid graft trial at the High Court is scheduled to be delivered on September 1

    According to Raja Petra, the alleged guilty verdict was not written by the trial judge but on behalf of the trial judge by persons unknown

    Further checks on the leaked document showed it was prepared by the Research Unit of the Kuala Lumpur High Court

    At the time of writing, the Office of the Chief Registrar of the Federal Court of Malaysia has yet to issue any official statement over the purported leak

    Last week, court officials lodged a police report over the leaked draft judgment in relation to former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak’s final appeal at the Federal Court

    In a similar fashion, the alleged leaked documents were published on Raja Petra’s portal, with the Office of the Chief Registrar of the Federal Court of Malaysia insisting that it was a draft judgment that had not been finalised yet, and that the document had been modified.

    ['document', 'rosmah', 'trial', 'leak', 'raja']

    GamesRadar+ is supported by its audience

    CNBC says "there's nothing going on" Reports that Amazon is planning to offer to buy EA are inaccurate, according to new information

    Speaking on CNBC, reporter David Faber said that "I have talked to some people who would actually know if there's something going on, and they say there's nothing going on." That was in response to a surge in EA's stock price following a USA Today's For the Win (opens in new tab) report earlier today, which claimed earlier today that Amazon will formally announce its offer to acquire EA at some point later today, having actually  made the offer at a previous time

    Amazon is not going to make a bid for Electronic Arts, sources tell CNBC's @DavidFaber

    If Amazon does put in a formal offer to acquire EA, as For the Win is reporting, then we'll have to wait and see whether two things happen

    If it doesn't, then the way is theoretically clear for Amazon to acquire EA

    ['go', 'amazon', 'offer', 'new', 'earlier']

    https://www.siasat.com/samsung-launches-new-foldable-smartphones-in-40-countries-2399179/

    08/26/2022, 21:10

    64.71% Shortened!

    Preorders for the foldable phones had been available in approximately 70 countries since Samsung unveiled them earlier this month during an online “Unpacked” event

    Samsung has witnessed a robust demand for its fourth-generation of foldables in India, registering more than 50,000 pre-bookings for Galaxy Fold4 and Galaxy Flip4 in less than 12 hours

    The ‘Bespoke Edition’ that offers glass colours and frame options will be available on Samsung Live and Samsung Exclusive Stores for Rs 97,999, the company said in a statement

    Consumers can also purchase 12GB+1TB variant exclusively on Samsung Live and Samsung Exclusive Stores for Rs 184,999

    While Samsung is an early trailblazer in the global foldable market, the new phones seem to lack breakthrough innovations and have similar specifications, some experts said

    Samsung shipped 60 million smartphones in the second quarter, leading the global smartphone market with a 21 percent market share, according to market research firm Canalys

    ['samsung', 'foldable', 'global', 'smartphone', 'galaxy']

    Sathiaraj is accused of having caused the death of the elderly woman at a house at Jalan Tasik Tambahan 2, Ampang, between 11.40am and 1pm, on Sept 19 last year

    The charge under Section 302 of the Penal Code provides for the mandatory death sentence upon conviction

    Deputy public prosecutor Heikal Ismail appeared for the prosecution while lawyer Saladin Mohd Yasin represented the accused

    A total of 19 prosecution witnesses and one defence witness as well as the accused himself were called to testify in the trial conducted since Dec 2, last year

    "He was an exemplary player who had it all and battled on the pitch," he said, via Bundesliga.com

  • A WEEKEND PACKED WITH POLITICAL EVENTS | FREE MALAYSIA TODAY

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/a-weekend-packed-with-political-events/

    08/26/2022, 20:12

    75.0% Shortened!

    In the capital, Umno president Ahmad Zahid Hamidi will hold a special briefing tomorrow for divisional committee members and leaders at the party’s headquarters

    PKR, a major component party of Pakatan Harapan, will be organising its 2022 election convention in preparation for the general election

    Convention director G Manivanan, in a statement, said it involved leaders from all levels of the party as well as activists, grassroots members and party volunteers

    It will also feature a special address by party president Anwar Ibrahim and an election strategy briefing by PKR deputy president and election director Rafizi Ramli

    In Sabah, Warisan is set to hold its 2021 annual meeting and party elections in Penampang tomorrow

    Only 20 positions in the party’s Supreme Council will be contested in this election, as the president, deputy president, and three vice-president’s posts have been won unopposed

    ['election', 'party', 'hold', 'convention', 'schedule']

  • NO RAISE FOR CLEANERS, GUARDS STILL UNDER OLD CONTRACTS, SAYS MINISTER

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/no-raise-for-cleaners-guards-still-under-old-contracts-says-minister/

    08/26/2022, 19:23

    53.85% Shortened!

    Saravanan told a press conference that the workers were bound by the terms in their existing contracts, and therefore not subject to the new minimum wage of RM1,500 which came into force on May 1 this year

    He added that the existing contracts were based on the previous minimum wage of RM1,200

    Saravanan said the finance ministry will revise the wages of the security guards and cleaners for those planning to renew their contracts

    Earlier, the Malaysian Trades Union Congress (MTUC) said companies supplying cleaners and security guards to schools and other government facilities were refusing to pay their workers the new minimum wage of RM1,500

    Its secretary-general Kamarul Baharin Mansor said this was akin to forced labour, pointing out that the new minimum wage had been implemented since May 1

    He added that if this issue persists, the matter will be raised at the upcoming International Labour Conference organised by the International Labour Organization (ILO)

    ['saravanan', 'say', 'cleaner', 'security', 'guard']

    Saravanan told a press conference that the workers were bound by the terms in their existing contracts, and therefore not subject to the new minimum wage of RM1,500 which came into force on May 1 this year

    He added that the existing contracts were based on the previous minimum wage of RM1,200

    Saravanan said the finance ministry will revise the wages of the security guards and cleaners for those planning to renew their contracts

    Earlier, the Malaysian Trades Union Congress (MTUC) said companies supplying cleaners and security guards to schools and other government facilities were refusing to pay their workers the new minimum wage of RM1,500

    Its secretary-general Kamarul Baharin Mansor said this was akin to forced labour, pointing out that the new minimum wage had been implemented since May 1

    He added that if this issue persists, the matter will be raised at the upcoming International Labour Conference organised by the International Labour Organization (ILO)

    ['saravanan', 'say', 'cleaner', 'security', 'guard']



  • HOW TO REPAIR THE BROKEN ELEMENTAL MONUMENT IN SUMERU: GENSHIN IMPACT PUZZLE GUIDE

    https://www.sportskeeda.com/esports/how-repair-broken-elemental-monument-sumeru-genshin-impact-puzzle-guide

    08/26/2022, 19:22

    72.73% Shortened!

    Repairing these monuments can be time-consuming, as players will need to complete a lengthy world quest to gain access to the solution

    Fans can find out how they can repair these broken Elemental Monuments here and gain tons of extra loot throughout Sumeru

    To fix the Broken Elemental Monuments in Genshin Impact 3.0, players will need to first complete a long line of world quests that begin with the Woodland Encounter quest

    These quests are part of the Aranyaka World Quest chain, and the quest that allows players to fix the monuments is known as the Agnihotra Sutra

    The Genshin Impact quest comes as the third part of the Aranyaka questline, and fans will need to finish the first two quests before gaining access to Agnihotra Sutra

    Aranakin will then look around for a nearby object to interact with and will repair a broken Elemental Monument if he comes across one

    ['player', 'gain', 'repair', 'broken', 'monument']

    Zaid, who was part of Umno until 2008, said the country had been witness to an “unusual legal process”

    However, representations to the attorney-general (AG) had resulted in reduced charges in the Nicky Liow case, as well as cases involving Vincent Tan’s son, and the troubled oil and gas firm Serba Dinamik, he said

    Zaid related his experience in representing Najib in an unsuccessful appeal to the Federal Court earlier this week, when the court had refused to grant time for the new defence from Zaid’s firm to prepare their case

    “Is it so unreasonable for us to ask our judges to allow us two months – not two years – to study the case?” he said

    Zaid said it was not unreasonable for Najib to want to engage new lawyers given that he had lost in the SRC International corruption case at the High Court and the Court of Appeal

    He questioned if it was unreasonable for Najib to want to explore other opportunities and perspectives in the case

    ['zaid', 'najib', 'ask', 'say', 'charge']

  • IT'S NORMAL, SAYS PM ABOUT EARLIER TABLING OF BUDGET

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/its-normal-says-pm-about-bringing-forward-tabling-of-budget/

    08/26/2022, 19:12

    45.45% Shortened!

    Ismail pointed out that Malaysia’s fifth prime minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi had also brought the tabling of the annual federal budget forward when he was prime minister

    “It’s a normal thing

    In fact, during Pak Lah’s time, the budget was always tabled in September,” he told reporters, referring to the former prime minister by his nickname

    Ismail said further details on the decision to bring forward the tabling of the budget will be announced by law minister Wan Junaidi Tuanku Jaafar

    Earlier, Wan Junaidi confirmed that Budget 2023 will be tabled on Oct 7, three weeks earlier than scheduled, with the start of the next Dewan Rakyat sitting also brought forward to Oct 3 from its originally-scheduled Oct 24

    He denied that the date change had anything to do with the next general election (GE15), which is expected by many to be held this year

    ['prime', 'minister', 'ismail', 'table', 'budget']

    Ismail pointed out that Malaysia’s fifth prime minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi had also brought the tabling of the annual federal budget forward when he was prime minister

    Earlier, Wan Junaidi confirmed that Budget 2023 will be tabled on Oct 7, three weeks earlier than scheduled, with the start of the next Dewan Rakyat sitting also brought forward to Oct 3 from its originally-scheduled Oct 24

    The Black Pyramid will see the undead forces come forth from the titular structure with enhanced aggression, with the only way to win through taking the pyramid for yourself

    More endgame scenarios will also be added in future updates as well

  • ANTONY PASSNOTES: WHO IS AJAX STAR MANCHESTER UNITED WANT?

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11145527/Antony-passnotes-Ajax-star-Manchester-United-want.html

    08/26/2022, 17:14

    90.16% Shortened!

    Manchester United are keen to complete a deal for Ajax and Brazil winger Antony this month Erik ten Hag is desperate to add further signings to build on Man United's win over Liverpool One player they hope to bring in is Ajax winger Antony who has been linked with a reunion with his former boss, while United are also interested in a £38million move for Dutch winger Cody Gakpo from PSV

    Antony may have beaten Gakpo to the league title with PSV finishing just two points behind Ten Hag's side last season, but the Dutch star outshines Antony in numerous measures

    Gakpo's 3.6 dribbles per game would have him clear compared to United's players last year, while he created 3.3 chances per game in the Eredivisie in contrast to Antony's 1.9

    Despite Antony's undoubted class and pedigree, along with his close working relationship with Ten Hag from their time in Holland, the statistics of Gakpo do raise questions over the move for Antony

    He is top class.' Antony's form has alerted several top European clubs, but United are favourites for his signature  While Ajax are insistent that Antony won't be sold, the Brazilian has made it clear he wants to join United

    A second £80m bid is expected from United and Antony is confident that he will be able to conclude a move before the transfer window shuts

    ['united', 'ten', 'hag', 'ajax', 'winger']

  • DUCKDUCKGO OPENS UP PUBLIC BETA FOR DUCK EMAIL PROTECTION SERVICE

    https://www.lowyat.net/2022/283029/duckduckgo-public-beta-email-protect/

    08/26/2022, 17:14

    50.0% Shortened!

    Now, the beta is open to the general public, letting anyone sign up for a @duck.com email address

    With Email Protection, it uses the quacky domain name to mask your real email from corporations, similar to Apple’s Hide My Email feature and Firefox Relay

    With private addresses, you can choose to deactivate them individually whenever you’re done with them or if you receive too much spam — DuckDuckGo has no limits to how many private email addresses you can create

    In conjunction with the open beta, the company has also added a new feature to Email Protection that automatically removes trackers from any links embedded in emails

    You can now also reply to emails directly from your duck.com address which helps keep your real email out of reach from companies but because it uses your personal email client, it doesn’t guarantee that your replies won’t contain any personal identifiers

    Users can register for Email Protection on the DuckDuckGo app, on their website while using its browser extension, or through DuckDuckGo for Mac

    ['duckduckgo', 'private', 'email', 'protection', 'service']

    Now, the beta is open to the general public, letting anyone sign up for a @duck.com email address

    With Email Protection, it uses the quacky domain name to mask your real email from corporations, similar to Apple’s Hide My Email feature and Firefox Relay

    With private addresses, you can choose to deactivate them individually whenever you’re done with them or if you receive too much spam — DuckDuckGo has no limits to how many private email addresses you can create

    In conjunction with the open beta, the company has also added a new feature to Email Protection that automatically removes trackers from any links embedded in emails

    You can now also reply to emails directly from your duck.com address which helps keep your real email out of reach from companies but because it uses your personal email client, it doesn’t guarantee that your replies won’t contain any personal identifiers

    Users can register for Email Protection on the DuckDuckGo app, on their website while using its browser extension, or through DuckDuckGo for Mac

    ['duckduckgo', 'private', 'email', 'protection', 'service']

  • AN EARLY IPHONE LAUNCH COULD GIVE THE WORLD ECONOMY A NEEDED...

    https://themalaysianreserve.com/2022/08/26/an-early-iphone-launch-could-give-the-world-economy-a-needed-lift/

    08/26/2022, 17:14

    79.31% Shortened!

    But the iPhone is much more than that and this year the world could do with having one released just a little earlier than usual

    But Apple may just save the day, at least cosmetically

    There’s little evidence to suggest that timing has any influence on total sales of a given iPhone model, but the release date has a direct impact on the financial period during which revenue is recorded.  Apple, in its cute, idiosyncratic way, has a unique earnings calendar with the quarter and financial year ending around a week before the end of September

    One week out of 52 doesn’t seem like much, but the iPhone’s annual release cycle coupled with anticipatory excitement makes that initial sales period the most important seven-day window of Apple’s financial year

    Recent data show that timing impacts what proportion of iPhone revenue occurs during that September quarter

    And that week’s numbers will matter to more than just Apple and its investors

    ['iphone', 'year', 'release', 'earlier', 'quarter']

    08/26/2022, 16:28

    64.71% Shortened!

    The League of Legends 2022 Star Guardian event was not as successful as the players or developers would have liked

    This made Riot Games extend the end-time of the event by a considerable period

    However, the event finally ended on August 24, 2022, with the onset of patch 12.16, which introduced a significant amount of balance updates centered around pro-play, the Udyr rework, and the Steel Valkyries 2022 event

    While the event has ended, Riot Games has confirmed that players will still be able to redeem their Star Guardian tokens and obtain event-exclusive rewards

    However, the tokens acquired through the event will be valid for an additional month and will only expire after October 3, 2022

    Hopefully, the new event will not witness the same level of bugs that the Star Guardians 2022 did.

    ['star', 'guardian', 'event', 'player', 'reward']

  • MUDA SEC-GEN CHARGED OVER LCS PROTEST | FREE MALAYSIA TODAY

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/muda-sec-gen-charged-over-lcs-protest/

    08/26/2022, 16:14

    50.0% Shortened!

    Amir, 31, pleaded not guilty to the charge before magistrate Fardiana Haryanti Ahmad Razali

    According to the charge sheet, Amir, as the organiser of the gathering, had failed to inform the officer in charge at the Dang Wangi district police headquarters five days before holding the assembly in front of the Sogo Complex at Jalan Tuanku Abdul Rahman at 2pm on Aug 14

    The charge was framed under Section 9 (1) of the Peaceful Assembly Act 2012, with the offence punishable with a maximum fine of RM10,000 under Section 9 (5) of the same Act, upon conviction

    Deputy public prosecutors Radzi Shah Ab Razak and Fatin Hanum Abdul Hadi offered bail of RM10,000 and proposed that Amir surrender his passport to the court and refrain from making any comment on the case on social media

    Another defence lawyer, Raj Surian Pillai, objected to the proposal for Amir to surrender his passport, saying he was not a flight risk

    Present in court was Muda president Syed Saddiq Syed Abdul Rahman

    ['muda', 'amir', 'hadi', 'charge', 'magistrate']

    The charge was framed under Section 9 (1) of the Peaceful Assembly Act 2012, with the offence punishable with a maximum fine of RM10,000 under Section 9 (5) of the same Act, upon conviction

    Deputy public prosecutors Radzi Shah Ab Razak and Fatin Hanum Abdul Hadi offered bail of RM10,000 and proposed that Amir surrender his passport to the court and refrain from making any comment on the case on social media

    Another defence lawyer, Raj Surian Pillai, objected to the proposal for Amir to surrender his passport, saying he was not a flight risk

    Present in court was Muda president Syed Saddiq Syed Abdul Rahman

    From the iPhone 14 to the Apple Watch Series 8, there are a few products that feel like shoo-ins this year

    Apple has released a new iPhone every September (except for 2020, when the pandemic pushed things back a month), and we're not expecting things to be any different in 2022

    The Apple Watch also tends to receive an upgrade at the same time as the iPhone 14 – although changes to Apple's wearable are often a little more incremental

    But while the Apple Watch Series 8 (opens in new tab) is expected to borrow the same design (again!), rumours of a brand new Watch model are a little more intriguing

    The so-called Apple Watch Pro is said to be offering the first redesign since the Apple Watch Series 4 (when things got a tiny bit rounder and thinner)

    If there's one Apple product that's due some design love, it's the entry-level iPad

    Arul Kanda said that when he later found out in February 2016 about the suppression of information by 1MDB's team, he had then gave whatever relevant 1MDB documents he had to the NAD

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/26/rafizi-dares-minister-to-sue-him-boustead-heavy-industries-and-audit-firm-for-exposing-links-to-lcs-scandal-if-untrue/24886

    08/26/2022, 15:14

    53.85% Shortened!

    The PKR deputy president was responding to Dr Abdul Latiff’s latest Facebook post this morning denying again that he was married to a woman named Zainab Mohd Salleh or having any links to the naval procurement assets

    “If Dr Latiff has nothing to do with Zainab Mohd Salleh and he (or his family) are not involved with the LCS project contracts or naval defence, he should immediately file a lawsuit against BHIC (the owner of the LCS forensic report), Alliance Alliance IFA (M) Sdn Bhd (the BHIC appointed auditor that investigated the LCS project) and me (who exposed this matter),” Rafizi said in a statement

    Rafizi also said that Dr Abdul Latiff did not address the forensic report findings that Mega P Asia Sdn Bhd was a company controlled by Zainab that had been awarded the naval defence contracts or that records from the Companies Commission of Malaysia (SSM) showed they were joint owners of the company

    “Dr Abdul Latiff’s Facebook denial is akin to accusing SSM of cheating,” he said

    He added that Dr Abdul Latiff’s mere denials were simply a page from the playbook adopted by Umno and former Umno politicians who have since crossed over to Bersatu when accused of corruption

    The LCS project is said to be the largest defence procurement in Malaysia’s history with a total cost of RM9 billion

    ['say', 'rafizi', 'abdul', 'latiff', 'company']

  • INTEL XESS IS OFFICIALLY COMING TO CALL OF DUTY MODERN WARFARE II

    https://videocardz.com/newz/intel-xess-is-officially-coming-to-call-of-duty-modern-warfare-ii

    08/26/2022, 15:10

    57.14% Shortened!

    Intel is working with game developers to bring support for XeSS to as many games as possible

    Intel’s Ryan Shrout and Tom Petersen provide an update on XeSS technology, which is actually a first update in months

    Intel XeSS technology will be supported by all GPUs with Shader Model 6.4 support, so for instance, NVIDIA Maxwell GPUs

    The video shared alongside the article over at Intel website features a demo with Tom’s PC using XeSS at balanced mode and Ryan’s using native 1440p resolution

    For Performance mode, which is the lowest quality mode but also the highest performance, Intel is sharing new benchmark data

    Thus far, Intel did not confirm when the first game with XeSS will become available

    ['intel', 'support', 'x', 'source', 'performance']

  • UMNO WON'T BE SWAYED BY CALLS TO DELAY GE15, SAYS ZAHID

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/umno-wont-be-swayed-by-calls-to-delay-ge15-says-zahid/

    08/26/2022, 14:14

    50.0% Shortened!

    In a Facebook post, Zahid said the opposition was merely seeking to delay GE15 to buy time to organise its strategy and launch more attacks against Umno

    He called on Umno members to close ranks and remain loyal to any decision the party leadership made, adding that its strength was in grassroots loyalty

    “Don’t even give an inch of room for the opposition to destroy Umno.” Last Monday, an emergency meeting of all Umno division leaders was held at Menara Dato Onn to discuss candidate selection for GE15

    According to Sungai Besar Umno chief Jamal Yunos, 158 division leaders had called for GE15 to be held immediately

    He said Zahid would relay this to Prime Minister Ismail Sabri Yaakob at the next Umno Supreme Council meeting

    GE15 has to be held by September next year, but some Umno leaders have been calling for it to be held this year following Barisan Nasional’s convincing victory in recent state elections

    ['umno', 'call', 'ge15', 'say', 'held']

  • TANK BREAKS DOWN ALONG BUSY KL HIGHWAY | FREE MALAYSIA TODAY

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/tank-breaks-down-along-busy-kl-highway/

    08/26/2022, 14:14

    57.14% Shortened!

    The Kuala Lumpur Command & Control Centre’s (KLCCC) Facebook page posted a screenshot from CCTV footage of the incident with a timestamp of 10.27am, showing the tank blocking the middle lane of the road heading from Carcosa Seri Negara to KL Sentral

    KLCCC, which provides updates on the city’s traffic, posted another screenshot with a timestamp of 10.49am showing three men believed to be army personnel at the scene, with police directing traffic several metres behind

    KLCCC then posted another update to state that the tank had been towed to a safe location at 11.21am

    Kuala Lumpur City Hall (DBKL) said another tank was despatched by the army to tow the tank about an hour later

    FMT has also reached out to the defence ministry for comment

    “This shows our country is at peace,” said another netizen, Chong Kim Teck

    ['army', 'tank', 'traffic', 'klccc', 'post']

    The Kuala Lumpur Command & Control Centre’s (KLCCC) Facebook page posted a screenshot from CCTV footage of the incident with a timestamp of 10.27am, showing the tank blocking the middle lane of the road heading from Carcosa Seri Negara to KL Sentral

    KLCCC, which provides updates on the city’s traffic, posted another screenshot with a timestamp of 10.49am showing three men believed to be army personnel at the scene, with police directing traffic several metres behind

    KLCCC then posted another update to state that the tank had been towed to a safe location at 11.21am

    Kuala Lumpur City Hall (DBKL) said another tank was despatched by the army to tow the tank about an hour later

    FMT has also reached out to the defence ministry for comment

    “This shows our country is at peace,” said another netizen, Chong Kim Teck

    ['army', 'tank', 'traffic', 'klccc', 'post']

  • NO KNOWLEDGE IF NAZLAN INVOLVED IN APPROVING 1MDB LOAN, SAYS ARUL KANDA

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/i-didnt-know-nazlans-role-in-approving-1mdb-loan-says-arul-kanda/

    08/26/2022, 14:13

    70.0% Shortened!

    Arul Kanda said this when re-examined by ad hoc prosecutor Gopal Sri Ram in the 1MDB audit report tampering trial, where Najib Razak is standing trial for abuse of power

    Sri Ram raised this question after lawyer Shafee Abdullah, representing Najib, brought up Nazlan’s role in approving the loan

    Arul Kanda, who was earlier cross-examined by Shafee, said he only knew Nazlan was the general counsel of the Maybank Group

    Nazlan was the trial judge who convicted Najib in the SRC International case on July 28, 2020

    Nazlan was appointed to the bench in 2015 and was elevated to the Court of Appeal early this year

    In June, the court allowed the prosecution’s application to examine Arul Kanda, who is charged with abetting Najib

    ['1mdb', 'arul', 'kanda', 'nazlan', 'loan']

    Nazlan was the trial judge who convicted Najib in the SRC International case on July 28, 2020

    Nazlan was appointed to the bench in 2015 and was elevated to the Court of Appeal early this year

    08/26/2022, 13:59

    62.5% Shortened!

    OnePlus Headphones Mobile accessories

    OnePlus currently sells two Nord-branded earphones in India - Nord Buds and Nord Buds CE

    These will be joined by a third pair of Nord earphones tomorrow, dubbed OnePlus Nord Wired Earphones

    As already evident from the name, these are wired earphones, unlike the Nord Buds and Nord Buds CE which are wireless

    OnePlus Nord Wired Earphones The Nord Wired Earphones have a sound cavity of 0.42cc and pack 9.2mm dynamic drivers

    OnePlus Nord Wired Earphones OnePlus hasn't revealed the price of the Nord Wired Earphones yet, but we know they will be sold through Amazon.in and probably through OnePlus's official Indian website

    ['oneplus', 'nord', 'earphone', 'wire', 'jack']
