    08/26/2022, 13:14

    62.5% Shortened!

    More info Liverpool could ultimately be forced to miss out on the signing of a new central midfielder this summer, with two of their reported targets said to be on course to join other clubs ahead of next week's all-important deadline

    Jurgen Klopp has been urged to move for a new playmaker before the summer transfer window slams shut and a number of potential targets, including the likes of Leandro Paredes and Marco Asensio, have been linked with Liverpool over the last few weeks

    Talks are now underway at club level in order to reach a compromise over a transfer fee, which suggests that Liverpool will come up short in the race to secure the Argentina international's signature in the near future.Liverpool have also been tentatively linked with a move for Asensio, who has been tipped to leave Real Madrid in the final days of the summer window

    However, the Spaniard is said to have emerged as a target for Manchester United, with the Red Devils having been on the lookout for a new midfielder all summer but to no avail as of yet

    We have eight midfielders, we still have enough midfielders

    But this is not a good situation, I don’t like it at all

    ['liverpool', 'new', 'midfielder', 'summer', 'target']

    It will be helmed by director Lee Joon Ik, who produced the movies “The Book of Fish,” “Anarchist from Colony,” and “The King and the Clown.” Shin Ha Kyun will be playing Jae Hyun, a reporter at Science M who lives an empty life after his wife’s death

    However, he exudes a sense of loneliness, which is different from the quiet smile his wife is displaying

  • APPELLATE COURT UPHOLDS ACQUITTAL OF MAT SABU'S SON ON DRUG CHARGE

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/appellate-court-upholds-acquittal-of-mat-sabus-son-on-drug-charge/

    08/26/2022, 13:14

    60.0% Shortened!

    Judge Kamaludin Md Said dismissed the prosecution’s appeal to reinstate Saiful’s conviction under Section 15(1)(a) of Dangerous Drug Act and his eight-month jail sentence

    “We are satisfied that the High Court judge (in deciding Saiful’s appeal) has considered the evidence as a whole

    “There was a reasonable doubt created against the prosecution’s case, thus the conviction is not safe,” said Kamaludin, who chaired a three-member panel

    Last year, High Court judge Collin Lawrence Sequerah freed Saiful from the drug charge, saying the police only took one sample of his urine for analysis instead of two

    The court also noted that taking only one urine sample had left open the possibility of contamination as the sample was used by police for both the screening test and the chemist’s confirmatory test

    In 2020, the magistrates’ court sentenced him to eight months’ jail after finding that the defence had failed to raise reasonable doubt in the prosecution’s case

    ['court', 'saiful', 'drug', 'judge', 'say']

    https://paultan.org/2022/08/26/2022-yamaha-xmax-250-scooter-price-update-for-malaysia-new-colours-priced-at-rm22298/

    08/26/2022, 12:14

    50.0% Shortened!

    New colour options for 2022 are Red and Matte Green, and every XMax 250 comes with a two-year or 20,000 km warranty against manufacturing defects

    Every purchase of an XMax 250 also comes with a Yamaha safety disc lock worth RM 100

    Power is rated at 22.5 hp at 7,000 rpm and 24.3 Nm of torque at 5,500 rpm, going through a CVT gearbox and belt final drive to the rear wheel

    Standard equipment is two-wheel ABS and traction control, working on single hydraulic discs on the 15-inch front and 14-inch rear wheel

    Suspension is done with a telescopic fork giving 110 mm of wheel travel while the rear is held up by a monoshock with 79 mm of travel

    A monochrome LCD panel displays information such as fuel gauge, temperature gauge, odometer, tripmeter and other related information and is flanked on either side by an analogue speedometer and tachometer

    ['yamaha', 'august', 'comment', 'xmax', 'come']

  • WHY HASN’T ANYONE BEEN CHARGED DIRECTLY IN LCS SCANDAL WHEN AUTHORITIES WERE AWARE OF IRREGULARITIES FOR PAST TWO YEARS? KIT SIANG ASKS MACC

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/26/why-hasnt-anyone-been-charged-directly-in-lcs-scandal-when-authorities-were-aware-of-irregularities-for-past-two-years-kit-siang-asks-macc/24859

    08/26/2022, 12:14

    64.71% Shortened!

    “Reading the forensic audit report on the LCS scandal from 2011 to 2014 on ‘questionable transactions’, even with over 10 redacted pages all in black, the question every reader would ask is — why MACC, which is worth its salt, had not charged anyone for the RM9 billion LCS scandal for over two years!” he said in a statement

    Lim said the LCS procurement scandal could very well turn out to be the “new 1MDB scandal”, noting that the declassified forensic audit report indicated high-level manipulation

    “Did the MACC investigate who is the very big ‘shark’ behind the RM9 billion LCS scandal?” he asked

    In its report released on August 8, the PAC said BNS was awarded a RM9.128 billion 10-year contract from 2013 to 2023 for the supply of the six LCS

    The PAC report also said the Malaysian government had to date already paid RM6.083 billion to the contractor, but none of the six LCS vessels has been completed

    The PAC report said equipment kept in storage for the LCS project is estimated to be worth RM1.7 billion, with an estimated 15 per cent of these already obsolete.

    ['charge', 'say', 'scandal', 'report', 'billion']

    The PAC report also said the Malaysian government had to date already paid RM6.083 billion to the contractor, but none of the six LCS vessels has been completed

    The PAC report said equipment kept in storage for the LCS project is estimated to be worth RM1.7 billion, with an estimated 15 per cent of these already obsolete.

  • NONE OF MY WIVES NAMED ZAINAB, INSISTS DR ABDUL LATIFF

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/26/none-of-my-wives-named-zainab-insists-dr-abdul-latiff/24855

    08/26/2022, 12:14

    45.45% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 26 — Minister in the Prime Minister's Department (Special Functions) Datuk Dr Abdul Latiff Ahmad today denied that his wife is named Zainab Mohd Salleh, the name of the woman linked to the controversial littoral combat ship (LCS) scandal

    "My wife, or among my wives, there is no person named Zainab Mohd Salleh,” he insisted

    PKR deputy president Rafizi Ramli had previously claimed in a statement that a person named Zainab Mohd Salleh was the second wife of Abdul Latiff and the owner of an offshore company which LCS funds were funneled into

    Fake companies are set up all over the world whose name is identical to a real company,” he said

    On Monday, news portal MalaysiaNow reported that Zainab is allegedly one of the owners of a company which is involved in the LCS project as being "dubiously addressed in Paris although payment to it was released in Singapore, a pattern rampant among other contractors awarded with the LCS work." It also reported that Zainab’s name was allegedly linked to another company that had received millions of dollars for the LCS project through suspicious foreign accounts

    The LCS project is the largest procurement in the history of the Ministry of Defence (Mindef) with a total cost of RM9 billion

    ['wife', 'name', 'zainab', 'lcs', 'company']

    Meanwhile, 1MDB’s former chief executive officer Arul Kanda Kandasamy, 45, is charged with abetting Najib in making the amendments to the report to protect the Pekan MP from being subjected to action

    Yesterday, the former prime minister was present at the court to attend his 1MDB trial proceedings before High Court Judge Collin Lawrence Sequerah

    Report it to us

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    Kwai Chai Hong's latest art installation ‘Beyond The Moonlit Door' carries a message of bountiful hope, optimism and a bright future, while charting a path to the full moon this Mid-Autumn Festival

    Kwai Chai Hong will be open to the public daily from 9am to midnight, which means visitors can choose to visit this installation during the day or at night – or both – as you will get a different viewing experience depending on the time of day

    "Traditionally, the Mid Autumn festival is celebrated while adoring the full moon

    The ‘Moonlit Doors’ at Kwai Chai Hong is part of the Mid-Autumn Festival set up, a new take on traditional oriental doors with vibrant colours derived from paper lanterns

    Kwai Chai Hong freezes time for us to appreciate the past and welcome the future

    With that, I wanted my artwork to interact with the surroundings while engaging visitors for a captivating experience celebrating the Mid-Autumn Festival," concludes Tan

    The Beyond The Moonlit Door installation will be on public display until Oct 2

  • NAJIB AT HIGH COURT AGAIN FOR 1MDB AUDIT REPORT TAMPERING TRIAL

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/najib-at-high-court-again-for-1mdb-audit-report-tampering-trial/

    08/26/2022, 10:13

    60.0% Shortened!

    This is the second time that he is appearing in the High Court here to answer 1MDB-related charges since his jailing on Tuesday

    Najib’s wife, Rosmah Mansor, was seen arriving at 9.20am

    Najib is charged with alleged abuse of power as the then prime minister and finance minister in February 2016 to obtain immunity from legal action and causing amendments to the finalised 1MDB audit report before it was tabled at the Public Accounts Committee (PAC) meeting in March 2016

    On June 24, the court allowed the prosecution’s application to examine former 1MDB CEO Arul Kanda, who is charged with abetting Najib

    Najib was also at the High Court here yesterday for his 1MDB trial, where he faces four charges of using his position as then prime minister to obtain bribes totalling RM2.3 billion from 1MDB funds, and 21 charges of money laundering involving the same amount

    He was sent to Kajang Prison on Tuesday after the Federal Court upheld his conviction and sentence of 12 years’ jail and a RM210 million fine in the SRC International case

    ['prime', 'minister', 'najib', 'high', 'court']

  • VESTED INTEREST IN PLANTATION, O&G SECTORS HOLDING ECONOMY BACK

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/vested-interest-in-plantation-og-sectors-holding-economy-back/

    08/26/2022, 09:12

    64.71% Shortened!

    Nungsari Ahmad Radhi said the country must move away from a plantation and resource-based economy in order to flourish

    Nungsari said what began as a narrow interest had evolved into a broad interest to prevent change in the national economy

    “The momentum to preserve this is in the national interest

    “You cannot do much to oil and gas because Petronas is there and the national Treasury depends on it.” He said the plantation and resource-based economy had come to define all aspects of the political economy, the socio-economic institutions in the country, how the government was financed as well as governmental influence on the economy

    The export of Malaysia’s palm oil and palm-oil based products grew by 55.2% from January to June to RM67.48 billion from RM43.47 billion in the same period the year before

    Plantation industries and commodities minister Zuraida Kamaruddin said palm oil had contributed to 66.1% of the total export earnings, amounting to RM44.63 billion this year compared to RM28.8 billion in the same period last year

    ['interest', 'plantation', 'oil', 'malaysia', 'economy']

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/highlight/2022/08/26/if-only-present-footballers-put-as-much-effort-as-greats-kuppan-and-namat/

    Kuppan and Namat saw the power of football as a force for good on many levels

    That year, he made the national team that won the Merdeka tournament

    He was very disciplined, very sincere and really meant business on the field.” With Kuppan as coach and Namat as captain, Penang won the Malaysia Cup in 1974, their last title in the competition

    During Kuppan’s tenure as the Malaysian team coach from 1972 to 1978, Namat became the national captain briefly in 1973 when M Chandran was injured

    Last month, the Penang government renamed a road in Butterworth after Kuppan, a first in the state for a football great

    That year, he made the national team that won the Merdeka tournament

    He was very disciplined, very sincere and really meant business on the field.” With Kuppan as coach and Namat as captain, Penang won the Malaysia Cup in 1974, their last title in the competition

    During Kuppan’s tenure as the Malaysian team coach from 1972 to 1978, Namat became the national captain briefly in 1973 when M Chandran was injured

    Last month, the Penang government renamed a road in Butterworth after Kuppan, a first in the state for a football great

    ['kuppan', 'national', 'team', 'namat', 'football']

  • 'LET'S NOT BE TOO HASTY'

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/08/26/lets-not-be-too-hasty

    08/26/2022, 08:14

    80.65% Shortened!

    On the role of masks in preventing the spread of Covid-19, Prof Moy said prior to the vaccines, ecological studies found that transmission was 7.5 times higher in countries that did not have a mask mandate or require universal mask use

    As with Singapore, Prof Moy said mask mandates should be retained in healthcare and public transport facilities, and also poorly ventilated areas

    “When it is no longer mandatory in the future, the decision to wear a mask indoors should be determined by the individual and high-risk groups, where they should weigh the risk and benefits before coming to a decision,” she added

    Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia public health expert Prof Dr Sharifa Ezat Wan Puteh said the removal of mask mandates indoors is a possibility, but added that booster uptake should first be higher

    “We should at least get the booster uptake to about 70% before we consider removing mask mandates while indoors

    She concurred with Prof Moy, saying that contingency plans should also be prepared for when masking was no longer required indoors (barring healthcare or public transport facilities)

    ['mask', 'malaysia', 'mandate', 'say', 'prof']

    On the role of masks in preventing the spread of Covid-19, Prof Moy said prior to the vaccines, ecological studies found that transmission was 7.5 times higher in countries that did not have a mask mandate or require universal mask use

    As with Singapore, Prof Moy said mask mandates should be retained in healthcare and public transport facilities, and also poorly ventilated areas

    “When it is no longer mandatory in the future, the decision to wear a mask indoors should be determined by the individual and high-risk groups, where they should weigh the risk and benefits before coming to a decision,” she added

    Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia public health expert Prof Dr Sharifa Ezat Wan Puteh said the removal of mask mandates indoors is a possibility, but added that booster uptake should first be higher

    “We should at least get the booster uptake to about 70% before we consider removing mask mandates while indoors

    She concurred with Prof Moy, saying that contingency plans should also be prepared for when masking was no longer required indoors (barring healthcare or public transport facilities)

    ['mask', 'malaysia', 'mandate', 'say', 'prof']

    08/26/2022, 08:14

    76.0% Shortened!

    With less than a year to go for the current parliamentary term, political pundits believe that an election is the most logical reason why these parties are meeting this weekend

    Umno is expected to hold a special briefing by its president Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi at the World Trade Centre Kuala Lumpur at 2pm tomorrow

    Scores of supporters and party leaders are expected to attend the briefing and it will be followed by a supreme council meeting at 8pm

    “The briefing is open to the public and even Opposition leaders can come and watch it,” said a senior party member who declined to be identified

    PKR will also hold its 2022 election convention that is open to all levels of leadership, including the central, state and branch levels, and the Youth, Wanita and Srikandi wings, as well as MPs, state assemblymen, party activists and the grassroots, including party volunteers

    “I think that some of them will make calls for the general election to be held and some strategies and stances that can be made during the convention,” he said

    ['meeting', 'political', 'held', 'election', 'party']

    “This is an industry that is contributing to the economy, livelihoods and the music industry

    “The PAS Youth chief needs to at least look at how we are conducting events in Malaysia and how we try to incorporate Malaysian values,” he said

  • INSTAGRAM TIGHTENS DEFAULT CONTENT SETTINGS FOR TEENS

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/25/23322141/instagram-sensitive-content-default-settings-teens

    08/26/2022, 08:10

    60.0% Shortened!

    The “Standard” setting in Instagram only lets users see some content deemed sensitive, while the “Less” option tightens the restrictions even further, and the “More” option allows users to see more sensitive content or accounts than the default settings

    While users over 18 years old typically have access to “Standard,” “Less,” and “More,” teenagers currently only have access to “Standard” and “Less.” In June, Instagram first introduced its “Less” option

    Instagram is also testing prompts for teens that suggest limiting who can interact with their content

    The test will ask them to review privacy and security settings related to who can re-share their content, who can message them, the type of content they can see, and time management

    The “Sensitive Content Control” feature launched on Instagram in July 2021

    Instagram has recently introduced other features on Instagram that cater to providing a secure experience

    ['user', 'content', 'instagram', 'feature', 'less']

    This isn’t the first time Microsoft has tested such an experience with Windows Insiders, either

    Overview of Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant and fires, in Enerhodar in Zaporizhzhia region, Ukraine, August 24, 2022

    A Russian official said Ukraine was to blame

    Because every minute the Russian troops stay at the nuclear power plant is a risk of a global radiation disaster," he said, referring to the United Nations nuclear watchdog

    Vladimir Rogov, a Russian-appointed official in the occupied town of Enerhodar near the plant, blamed Ukrainian armed forces for Thursday's incident, saying they caused a fire in a forest near the plant

    Satellite images showed a fire near the plant but Reuters could not verify its cause

    Ukraine and the West say this is a baseless pretext for a war of conquest

    ['zaporizhzhia', 'nuclear', 'power', 'plant', 'ukraine']

    For example, for the system icon in the sidebar, a hover will cause the PC screen in the icon to glare on and off

    Then, for network and internet, the icon for the Wi-Fi bar will fills itself up

    In other examples, on gaming, the controller icon jumps up and down, and then for Windows Update, the refresh icon will spin around

    This isn’t the first time Microsoft has tested such an experience with Windows Insiders, either

    The exclusive content was first discovered (opens in new tab) on the PlayStation Network, which quietly listed an "exclusive quest" for all PlayStation versions of the game, including the standard edition

    We'll have more information on these soon.August 25, 2022 Further details on the PlayStation-exclusive quest and potion recipe are being kept under wraps, but it's noteworthy that there's any platform-exclusive content at all

    It's worth noting that the exclusive quest is a bonus for anyone who gets a copy of the game on PS4 or PS5 at any time, while the potion recipe is a pre-order reward for those who lock down their copy of the game ahead of launch

    Wood confirmed (opens in new tab) that all Hogwarts Legacy PlayStation pre-orders, whether physical or digital, will come with the bonus potion recipe

    If you're keen on that potion recipe or just want to secure your copy early, here's how you can pre-order Hogwarts Legacy and take advantage of a $10 gift card

    08/26/2022, 06:13

    50.0% Shortened!

    BUT NOT AS YOU KNOW IT Manchester United have been offered the chance to sign Real Madrid winger Marco Asensio for €30 million (£25.3m), according to reports

    According to The Telegraph, United have been offered a cheaper alternative as Asensio has been made available for €30m (£25.3m)

    The report claims that United were made aware of Asensio availability before they completed their £60m deal for Casemiro

    Asensio is now in the final year of his contract with Madrid and the Spanish champions would rather secure a transfer fee for him this summer, rather than see him leave on a free next year

    The 26-year-old has played just seven minutes across both of Madrid’s La Liga matches so far this season

    ‘If he doesn’t leave, from September 1 he will be a 100 per cent Real Madrid player.’ For more stories like this, check our sport page

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/25/23322166/apple-iphone-14-pro-notch-patent-leaks

    08/26/2022, 06:12

    64.71% Shortened!

    The patent application covers several possible variants of a device that combines a camera, an infrared light emitter, and a “light folding element” that can redirect the IR light

    The notch currently houses a lot of technology, including a selfie camera, an infrared camera, a depth sensor, and a dot projector, and Apple already shrunk the notch by 20 percent with the iPhone 13 lineup last year

    But with this patent, Apple is saying that it can arrange some of that tech in such a way that lets it decrease the size of the notch

    That said, the USPTO publishing this application isn’t a guarantee that the technology will show up in an Apple device

    And Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo reported on a no-notch Pro iPhone 14 just days before the iPhone 13 hit store shelves

    Twitter user “DuanRui,” who posted images on Twitter of the iPhone 12 Mini name before Apple publicly announced it, tweeted photos of what appears to be the pill cutout and selfie cam punch hole on an iPhone 14 Pro

    ['notch', 'apple', 'iphone', 'pro', 'light']

    The free version of Cronometer has a barcode scanner

    (I’m sure they’re in there somewhere.) And from a few items I scanned around the house, it sure seems like Cronometer’s barcode scanner is better than MFP’s

    There’s no option to maintain your weight or to gain weight, only different rates of weight loss

    Once you get started, though, the interface is straightforward, and the barcode scanner works well

  • 62 NATIONAL SERVICE CAMP OPERATORS BANKRUPT, SAYS REPORT | FREE MALAYSIA TODAY

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/26/62-national-service-camp-operators-bankrupt-says-report/

    08/26/2022

    65.0% Shortened!

    They had failed to repay bank loans after investing up to RM12 million for each training camp, Utusan Malaysia reported

    According to the daily, it is estimated that RM984 million was spent to build the 82 PLKN campsites in the country, most of which are now redundant, even though the government had tried to revive these camps by renting them out to other parties

    Five of them are in Sabah and Sarawak

    Othman Yaakob, the owner of the PLKN Eco Millenium campsite at Beranang in Sepang, Selangor, said some owners offered their camps for rent when the programme was abolished, but could not charge profitable rates

    Othman said the owners spent RM3 million to RM4 million during the first phase of the programme in 2003, up to RM8 million during the second phase in 2004

    There are owners who are in debt until today

    The PLKN programme was introduced in 2004 by the Barisan Nasional government and abolished in 2018 when the Pakatan Harapan administration took over

    ['programme', 'plkn', 'campsite', 'million', 'camp']

    08/26/2022

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 26 — A 24-year-old woman was believed to have been smothered to death with a pillow by her boyfriend at a house in Kampung Pandan, Klang near here day before yesterday

    South Klang district police chief ACP Cha Hoong Fong said his team received a complaint, lodged by a local woman, at about 9.12pm yesterday

    “The complaints’ counter of the Klang police station received a report by a local woman who said she received a video call at 7.18pm yesterday asking for help, to pick up a man in Kampung Pandan, Klang

    “Police arrived at the location of the incident which is a lot-type house in Kampung Pandan, Klang

    He said the suspect, aged 19, who attempted to flee, was arrested by police near the location of the incident

    “The Selangor contingent police headquarters’ forensic unit of the Criminal Investigation Department conducted an investigation at the scene and found several items that could serve as evidence in the investigation,” he said, adding that the suspect had no past criminal record

    ['woman', 'klang', 'police', 'say', 'suspect']

  • KING FACING PRESSURE OVER POSSIBLE NAJIB PARDON

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/king-facing-pressure-over-possible-najib-pardon

    08/26/2022

    68.42% Shortened!

    Many leaders in Umno privately want the king to pardon Najib but it will take some time to see through the process

    Meanwhile, Najib’s opponents started an online campaign to persuade the king not to issue a pardon, arguing the sentence is a deterrent against corruption for future leaders

    In Najib’s case, there’s no indication yet that Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob will back a petition for a royal pardon.  “It depends on what sort of deal Najib can get with Ismail Sabri and whether the PM will support him,” said James Chin, a professor of Asian Studies at the University of Tasmania who looks at governance issues in Southeast Asia

    His decision saw Umno retake the reins of power following a two-year absence.  Many leaders in Umno privately want the king to pardon Najib but it will take some time to see through the process

    Najib has to serve some jail time first before getting his pardon, though he has to make the petition within 14 days from the date of the appeal decision or else he loses his Parliament seat.  If he fails to get a pardon, he will be disqualified from the elections for five years after he is released from jail

    The king deliberates on petitions in consultation with the Pardons Board.  Mahathir told Bloomberg News earlier this week that he saw a “50-50 chance” that Najib would eventually get a pardon

    ['leader', 'umno', 'king', 'pardon', 'najib']

    Many leaders in Umno privately want the king to pardon Najib but it will take some time to see through the process

    Meanwhile, Najib’s opponents started an online campaign to persuade the king not to issue a pardon, arguing the sentence is a deterrent against corruption for future leaders

    In Najib’s case, there’s no indication yet that Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob will back a petition for a royal pardon.  “It depends on what sort of deal Najib can get with Ismail Sabri and whether the PM will support him,” said James Chin, a professor of Asian Studies at the University of Tasmania who looks at governance issues in Southeast Asia

    His decision saw Umno retake the reins of power following a two-year absence.  Many leaders in Umno privately want the king to pardon Najib but it will take some time to see through the process

    Najib has to serve some jail time first before getting his pardon, though he has to make the petition within 14 days from the date of the appeal decision or else he loses his Parliament seat.  If he fails to get a pardon, he will be disqualified from the elections for five years after he is released from jail

    The king deliberates on petitions in consultation with the Pardons Board.  Mahathir told Bloomberg News earlier this week that he saw a “50-50 chance” that Najib would eventually get a pardon

    ['leader', 'umno', 'king', 'pardon', 'najib']

    ['battlefield', 'season', 'arm', 'new', 'player']

    In addition to new weapons and vehicles, Master of Arms will bring a bevy of new features to the Battlefield 2042, geared towards giving players a way to unlock season 1 content they may have missed and also expanding Battlefield Portal

    Players will also be able to use Assignments to unlock season 1’s vehicles, weapons, and Specialist if they missed out the first time.” All told it seems like a decent, if run-of-the-mill, seasonal update for a multiplayer shooter

    Maybe that’s not necessarily enough to lure new or lapsed players in, but for the stalwart Battlefield 2042 faithful, maybe some run-of-the-mill stability is welcome right now

    A weekly roundup of the best things from Polygon Please check your email to find a confirmation email, and follow the steps to confirm your humanity

    Please enter a valid email and try again

    Please enter a valid email and try again.

    ['battlefield', 'season', 'arm', 'new', 'player']



  • GALAXY BUDS 2 PRO VS PIXEL BUDS PRO VS AIRPODS PRO: THE BATTLE OF THE BEST EARBUDS

    https://www.zdnet.com/article/galaxy-buds-2-pro-vs-pixel-buds-pro-vs-airpods-pro-the-battle-of-the-best-earbuds/

    08/26/2022, 05:28

    83.33% Shortened!

    But more recently, the three tech giants have become competitors with one another when it comes to high-end wireless earbuds.  Samsung's latest entry is the Galaxy Buds 2 Pro, while Google joined in on the fun with the Pixel Buds Pro, and Apple has long had the AirPods Pro

    Why? Because the Pixel Buds Pro supports multipoint connections

    And that's true regardless of what company makes the devices involved.  For instance, during my testing of the Pixel Buds Pro, I often had them connected to a Pixel 6 Pro and a MacBook Air

    With the AirPods Pro, you pair them with a single device – let's say an iPhone – and your AirPods are instantly linked to every Apple device that's signed in using the same iCloud account

    It's similar to 360 Audio on the Buds 2 Pro, while the Pixel Buds Pro are supposed to get Spatial Audio later this year

    I've yet to find another pair of wireless earbuds that comes close to the overall sound quality of the AirPods Pro

    ['apple', 'earbuds', 'bud', 'pro', 'pixel']

    But more recently, the three tech giants have become competitors with one another when it comes to high-end wireless earbuds.  Samsung's latest entry is the Galaxy Buds 2 Pro, while Google joined in on the fun with the Pixel Buds Pro, and Apple has long had the AirPods Pro

    Why? Because the Pixel Buds Pro supports multipoint connections

    And that's true regardless of what company makes the devices involved.  For instance, during my testing of the Pixel Buds Pro, I often had them connected to a Pixel 6 Pro and a MacBook Air

    With the AirPods Pro, you pair them with a single device – let's say an iPhone – and your AirPods are instantly linked to every Apple device that's signed in using the same iCloud account

    It's similar to 360 Audio on the Buds 2 Pro, while the Pixel Buds Pro are supposed to get Spatial Audio later this year

    I've yet to find another pair of wireless earbuds that comes close to the overall sound quality of the AirPods Pro

    ['apple', 'earbuds', 'bud', 'pro', 'pixel']

  • HANDS-ON: SAMSUNG’S GALAXY Z FOLD 4 KICKSTAND CASE IS GREAT, BUT A BIT DISAPPOINTING

    https://9to5google.com/2022/08/25/galaxy-z-fold-4-kickstand/

    08/26/2022, 05:13

    80.65% Shortened!

    We’ve had a chance to try out Samsung’s kickstand case for the Galaxy Z Fold 4, which looked promising but ultimately isn’t quite what most were expecting.

    The “Slim Standing Cover” for the Galaxy Z Fold 4 is a two-piece case that includes a bumper for the front display, a full cover for the back of the phone, and a kickstand built-in

    Unfortunately, this isn’t what the “Slim Standing Cover” for the Galaxy Z Fold 4 does

    That’s not to say this is a bad case

    But, it’s a little disappointing that the kickstand isn’t adjustable at all

    I’d love to see Samsung take a note from Nintendo in the Fold 4’s kickstand case

    ['galaxy', 'fold', 'samsung', 'case', 'kickstand']

    Available now in select regions – now including India and the UK – One UI 5.0 beta 2 brings a relatively minor update on top of the first beta

    Beyond that, One UI 5.0 beta 2 also adds a new “Smart Suggestions” widget which can suggest which apps to open

    There’s also the new Maintenance Mode which prevents personal data from being accessed when you send in a phone for repair

    Another new feature is Privacy Detection

  • XBOX RESPONDS TO PLAYSTATION'S PRICE HIKE

    https://www.windowscentral.com/gaming/xbox/xbox-responds-to-playstations-price-hike

    08/26/2022, 03:28

    75.0% Shortened!

    Since that announcement, Xbox fans and commentators from across the gaming sphere have wondered if Microsoft would follow suit with the Xbox Series X or Xbox Series S

    Microsoft has won a lot of ground in the current console generation by focusing on value via Xbox Game Pass, and the more affordable Xbox Series S, which targets 1080p while bringing next-gen speeds

    In a statement to Windows Central, a Microsoft spokesperson confirmed that there are no plans to raise the price of the Xbox Series X or the Xbox Series S, reiterating that they will remain at their baseline RRPs in various currencies, including USD, GBP, and EUR

    Our Xbox Series S suggested retail price remains at $299 (£250, €300) the Xbox Series X is $499 (£450, €500).” While this isn’t a hard guarantee that we will never see a price hike for the Xbox Series X and Xbox Series S consoles, it’s certainly an encouraging sign that Microsoft has no intentions to do so in the short term

    Jez Corden is a Senior Editor for Windows Central, focusing primarily on all things Xbox and gaming

    Follow on Twitter @JezCorden and listen to his Xbox Two podcast, all about, you guessed it, Xbox! Get the best of Windows Central in in your inbox, every day! Thank you for signing up to Windows Central

    ['window', 'central', 'xbox', 'price', 'microsoft']

  • HONOR 70 ARRIVES IN THE UK ON SEPTEMBER 2ND FOR £480

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/25/23321302/honor-70-uk-release-date-price-specs-details-cameras-solo-cut-mode

    08/26/2022, 03:11

    72.73% Shortened!

    A little under three months after it was first announced in China, Honor has launched its midrange Honor 70 smartphone in the UK

    Compared to last year’s Honor 50, the Honor 70’s camera specs are a lot better balanced this time around

    (An Honor 60 was announced in China in December but never saw a global release.) Rather than pairing an incredibly high-resolution 108-megapixel camera with three extra sensors totaling just 12-megapixels in resolution between them, the Honor 70 balances a 54-megapixel main sensor with a 50-megapixel ultrawide (which also handles macro shots) and a 2-megapixel depth sensor

    Otherwise, the Honor 70 has a similar overall design to the Honor 50

    Alongside its new smartphone, Honor is also announcing the Pad 8 tablet, which Gizmochina reports that it launched as the Honor Tablet 8 in China last month

    It’ll cost £270 in the UK and will be available direct from Honor tomorrow or on September 2nd from Amazon

    ['balance', 'camera', 'verge', 'announce', 'china']

  • MEW COMING TO POKEMON UNITE SEPTEMBER 2

    https://thenerdstash.com/mew-coming-to-pokemon-unite-september-2/

    08/26/2022, 02:14

    68.42% Shortened!

    As part of its first-anniversary celebration, Pokemon UNITE has revealed details on the newest Pokemon that will be joining the fray next month, as well as some new details on the latest events and features players can be expected in September

    The biggest piece of news is that the Pokemon UNITE will be adding the Mythical Pokemon Mew to its roster on September 2, 2022, the first of three new Pokemon previously teased to be coming to the game

    The Mythical Pokemon Mew will be the first of the three new fighters added to Pokemon UNITE on September 2, and as seen in the newest trailer, players will need to collect mural fragments in order to unlock Mew’s Unite license

    Mew will have more learnable moves than any other Pokemon in Pokemon UNITE, as well as the ability to forget and re-learn moves throughout the battle

    Finally, a new event called the Legacy Trainer Showdown will also be added for a limited time to Pokemon UNITE on September 9

    In it, players will be able to do battle against iconic Pokemon trainers from across the series, including Leon, Korrina, Raihan, and Leaf, who will be using their signature Pokemon

    Cumulatively, net profit in 6MFY22 ballooned 79.97% to RM830.19 million from RM461.3 million as revenue soared 67.21% to RM7.93 billion from RM4.74 billion

    For 6MFY22, Genting trimmed its net loss to RM259.22 million from RM895.29 million in 6MFY21, with revenue jumping 90.77% to RM9.9 billion from RM5.19 billion

    For 6MFY22, PPB's net profit jumped 70% to RM996.57 million from RM585.65 million a year earlier, as revenue increased 34% to RM2.96 billion from RM2.2 billion

    Quarterly revenue grew 22.6% to RM615.61 million from RM501.97 million

    First-half revenue shrank 65.8% to RM167.71 million from RM490.38 million

    But that’s where I first learned about the O.MG Cable

    Put simply, you can do a lot of damage with a cable that doesn’t behave the way your target expects

    It’s just an ordinary, unremarkable USB cable — or that’s what a hacker would want you to think

    “It’s a cable that looks identical to the other cables you already have,” explains MG, the cable’s creator

    The scary thing about the O.MG cable is that it’s extremely covert

    Holding the cable in my hand, there was really nothing to make me suspicious

    Speaking of the new patch, the August 2022 update is quite advantageous for the device system

    Now making some more beneficial changes, Huawei is preparing to roll out the HarmonyOS software for even ineligible smartphones.

    Currently, the Huawei Smart Screen V series 2021 models are grabbing the HarmonyOS 3 beta update.

    At this moment, Huawei has turned its face towards the smart screen product and has begun distributing the HarmonyOS 3 beta update to the V55 2021 and other V series models

    08/26/2022

    76.0% Shortened!

    Friday, 26 Aug 2022

    Loh Kean Yew of Singapore plays a shot against Kunlavut Vitidsarn of Thailand during a badminton game of the men's singles quarterfinal in the BWF World Championships in Tokyo Friday, Aug

    "I just tried my best to fight for every point and that was all that matters." The 21-year-old Vitidsarn is a three-time junior world champion who is seen as one of world badminton's best young players

    Marin is feeling her way back into competition after suffering a horror knee injury last year that forced her to miss the Tokyo Olympics and kept her out of action for a year

    She returned to the court in May this year but current world number one Yamaguchi was too strong in their world championships quarter-final in Tokyo, advancing with a 21-17, 21-17 win

    China's Chen, who won gold last year in Tokyo, beat Canada's Michelle Li 21-18, 21-17, while Taiwan's Tai advanced with a 21-16, 21-9 win over Thailand's Busanan Ongbamrungphan

    ['loh', 'world', 'tokyo', 'say', 'final']

  • INSTAGRAM NOW ALLOWS INDIVIDUAL CONTENT TO BE SHARED THROUGH QR CODES

    https://www.lowyat.net/2022/283055/instagram-now-allows-individual-content-shared-through-qr-codes/

    08/26/2022

    53.85% Shortened!

    Instagram has rolled out a new feature that allows you to now share individual content via QR codes

    To do this, press the “three dots” icon that is usually located on the top right corner of a post and then select QR Code

    Doing so will bring up a customisation pop-up which lets you change the colour of the code before saving it onto your device’s camera roll

    Details that are displayed beneath the code will depend on the type of content that you’re sharing

    For instance, sharing a QR code of a photo, video or Reel will show their upload date and the creator’s user handle, whereas tags and locations will display their respective hashtags and geotags.  Neither Instagram or its parent company Meta has officially announced the new QR code feature, which was recently discovered by several users on Twitter

    And if you wish to try out the new QR code feature for yourself, be sure to update the app to the latest version that is currently available

    ['instagram', 'new', 'feature', 'share', 'content']

    Instagram has rolled out a new feature that allows you to now share individual content via QR codes

    To do this, press the “three dots” icon that is usually located on the top right corner of a post and then select QR Code

    Doing so will bring up a customisation pop-up which lets you change the colour of the code before saving it onto your device’s camera roll

    Details that are displayed beneath the code will depend on the type of content that you’re sharing

    For instance, sharing a QR code of a photo, video or Reel will show their upload date and the creator’s user handle, whereas tags and locations will display their respective hashtags and geotags.  Neither Instagram or its parent company Meta has officially announced the new QR code feature, which was recently discovered by several users on Twitter

    And if you wish to try out the new QR code feature for yourself, be sure to update the app to the latest version that is currently available

    ['instagram', 'new', 'feature', 'share', 'content']



  • ONEPLUS 10T REVIEW: WHEN SPEED MEETS EFFICIENCY

    https://www.lowyat.net/2022/282333/oneplus-10t-review/

    08/26/2022

    90.0% Shortened!

    This is because the brand never released a OnePlus 10, only a 10 Pro, so this should technically sit below the Pro variant despite its housing of a more powerful chip

    I haven’t used a OnePlus since the 3T, so to me, this phone felt more like a generic, but still powerful, mobile device rather than a quirky and unique flagship killer — the type of phone the brand was initially famous for

    The power button and volume rocker can be found on the right and left side respectively, but the one feature that is notably missing from the phone is the OnePlus alert slider

    The battery performance is probably my favourite thing about this phone

    As for the macro sensor, it’s not the microscope-adjacent tool you might expect from something like the OPPO Find X3 Pro, but rather, it’s clearly just an extra camera OnePlus fitted onto it as a gimmick

    With the better ultra-wide camera and a more power-efficient display, the realme device comes in at only RM2999

    ['oneplus', '10t', 'phone', 'like', 'charge']

  • MODERNA SUES PFIZER, BIONTECH FOR COVID-19 VACCINE PATENT INFRINGEMENT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/08/26/moderna-sues-pfizer-biontech-for-covid-19-vaccine-patent-infringement

    08/26/2022

    77.78% Shortened!

    21, 2021 file photo shows vials of the Pfizer and Moderna COVID-19 vaccines in Jackson, Miss

    Moderna is suing its main competitors Pfizer and the German drugmaker BioNTech, accusing the rivals of copying Moderna’s technology in order to make their own vaccine

    Moderna said Friday, Aug

    "Moderna believes that Pfizer and BioNTech's Covid-19 vaccine Comirnaty infringes patents Moderna filed between 2010 and 2016 covering Moderna's foundational mRNA technology," the US-based biotech firm said in a statement

    "Pfizer and BioNTech copied this technology, without Moderna's permission, to make Comirnaty," Moderna said

    "Pfizer and BioNTech have failed to do so," the firm added

    ['pfizer', 'moderna', 'covid', 'vaccine', 'biontech']

  • BAIDU LAUNCHES QUANTUM COMPUTER IN CHINA AND GIVES PEOPLE ACCESS VIA PC, SMARTPHONE OR THE CLOUD

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/08/26/baidu-launches-quantum-computer-in-china-and-gives-people-access-via-pc-smartphone-or-the-cloud

    08/26/2022

    82.35% Shortened!

    Chinese tech giant Baidu launched a self-developed quantum computer in Beijing on Friday

    In addition, it built a system enabling everyone to gain access to the quantum computer with any device, including a smartphone

    The quantum computer is called Qianshi and can be accessed by a Baidu app from the Apple, Huawei or Xiaomi stores

    The Baidu quantum computer uses superconducting materials to generate an extremely low temperature for the quantum processor unit, which is similar to a CPU in a traditional computer

    “It is the world’s first integrated solution for both the hardware and software of quantum calculation,” said Duan Runyao, director of the Institute for Quantum Computing, Baidu

    Quantum computing has many applications

    ['baidu', 'quantum', 'computer', 'system', 'compute']

    “It is the world’s first integrated solution for both the hardware and software of quantum calculation,” said Duan Runyao, director of the Institute for Quantum Computing, Baidu

  • DIGI SAYS THE RM5 CHARGE ON ITS PREPAID USERS WAS AN ERROR, BUT WE THINK IT'S BS

    https://soyacincau.com/2022/08/26/digi-says-rm5-charge-prepaid-users-error-we-think-its-bs-xrs/

    08/26/2022

    68.42% Shortened!

    Digi has since responded to the matter, claiming that it was all an ‘error’

    We thank our customers for their understanding on this matter,” – Digi That being said, we’re certainly not convinced that it was, as Digi says, an “error”

    As such, if you’re a Digi Prepaid customer, you should check your credit balance by then to make sure that you’ve received your refund

    Furthermore, seeing as Digi said the ‘free services offered’ remain intact and available to use, you could still be getting the mobile data package that Digi had subscribed for you on your behalf, for free

    If you have not received your refund by then though, you should contact Digi customer support at 0162211800

    If you have gotten a refund, you’ll get an SMS from Digi that says your account has been adjusted with RM5.00 free credit

  • SG COPS WARN OF PROPERTY AGENT SCAM AFTER CLOSE TO 1000 PEOPLE LOSE ALMOST S$4MIL

    https://www.thestar.com.my/tech/tech-news/2022/08/26/sg-cops-warn-of-property-agent-scam-after-close-to-1000-people-lose-almost-s4mil

    08/26/2022

    72.73% Shortened!

    During the conversation, the scammer posing as a registered property agent would convince the victim of his credentials by sending a photo of the agent’s business card and pictures or videos of the property to be leased

    The scammer would then ask for the victim’s personal details to prepare the lease agreement

    They can do so by liaising with a property agent using only the agent's phone number registered on the Council for Estate Agencies (CEA)’s public register

    Members of the public may check whether a property agent is registered with the CEA by searching for the agent’s phone number on the register

    If the search does not lead to the property agent’s profile page, it means the property agent has not registered that phone number with the CEA and the listing may be fake

    The public can also contact the agent’s property agency to verify the authenticity of the listing

    ['scammer', 'property', 'agent', 'victim', 'would']

    During the conversation, the scammer posing as a registered property agent would convince the victim of his credentials by sending a photo of the agent’s business card and pictures or videos of the property to be leased

    The scammer would then ask for the victim’s personal details to prepare the lease agreement

    They can do so by liaising with a property agent using only the agent's phone number registered on the Council for Estate Agencies (CEA)’s public register

    Members of the public may check whether a property agent is registered with the CEA by searching for the agent’s phone number on the register

    If the search does not lead to the property agent’s profile page, it means the property agent has not registered that phone number with the CEA and the listing may be fake

    The public can also contact the agent’s property agency to verify the authenticity of the listing

    ['scammer', 'property', 'agent', 'victim', 'would']

    08/26/2022

    Although Gervan Wong did not know Douglas Wong, he agreed to accompany Chen to “settle the issue”, and rented a Mercedes car for this purpose

    While on the way to meet Douglas Wong — who had agreed to meet Chen under the illusion that they would be having drinks — both Chen and Gervan Wong agreed that they would take the victim to a secluded place

    If Douglas Wong admitted to raping Chen’s wife, the men would attack him, DPP Huo said

    Gervan Wong then joined in the attack with the baton, and the two assailants took turns hurting the victim

    Both Chen and Gervan Wong were arrested by the police later that afternoon at around 3.30pm at Gervan Wong’s home, where the police seized the baton and the knuckleduster

    As for the allegations of being raped, DPP Huo said that Chen’s wife had not demanded for the victim to be hurt

  • HP'S FIRST "IPS BLACK" MONITOR REALLY STANDS OUT WITH THUNDERBOLT 4

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/25/23321425/hp-z32k-g3-ips-black-pc-monitor-contrast-thunderbolt-4-specs

    08/25/2022, 23:28

    70.0% Shortened!

    HP isn’t the first company to debut a monitor with an IPS Black panel, a technology that doubles the contrast ratio of IPS to provide richer contrast and darker blacks

    The Z32K G3 is positioned for creators who need a color-accurate display on top of the impressive contrast offered by IPS Black

    It also supports VESA mounts in case you’d prefer to use a monitor arm

    But back to the IPS Black — rich contrast and deep blacks are typically associated with OLED

    But OLED aside, and within the realm of tech that’s more commonly used in PC monitors, IPS Black seems to push well ahead of both VA and TN in terms of color accuracy and contrast ratio

    Dell’s 32-inch IPS Black monitor currently costs $859.99 (it seems to be on sale, as it’s normally priced at $1,149.99), but HP hasn’t yet shared a price for this monitor

    ['monitor', 'ip', 'black', 'contrast', 'ratio']

    HP isn’t the first company to debut a monitor with an IPS Black panel, a technology that doubles the contrast ratio of IPS to provide richer contrast and darker blacks

    The Z32K G3 is positioned for creators who need a color-accurate display on top of the impressive contrast offered by IPS Black

    It also supports VESA mounts in case you’d prefer to use a monitor arm

    But back to the IPS Black — rich contrast and deep blacks are typically associated with OLED

    But OLED aside, and within the realm of tech that’s more commonly used in PC monitors, IPS Black seems to push well ahead of both VA and TN in terms of color accuracy and contrast ratio

    Dell’s 32-inch IPS Black monitor currently costs $859.99 (it seems to be on sale, as it’s normally priced at $1,149.99), but HP hasn’t yet shared a price for this monitor

  • GOOGLE'S WAZE IS SHUTTING DOWN ITS CARPOOLING SERVICE

    https://www.theverge.com/2022/8/25/23321493/google-waze-carpool-shutting-down-covid-commute

    08/25/2022, 23:28

    76.0% Shortened!

    Starting in September, the company will begin the process of winding down its carpooling service, which had been available in the US, Brazil, and Israel

    Waze said it will explore other ways it can help serve the 150 million customers worldwide that use its navigation app

    In 2018, the company launched its own standalone carpool app

    Waze insisted it wasn’t in the business to make money

    Waze’s service relied on a steady stream of people going to the office every day, and that has fundamentally changed as a result of the pandemic

    Waze said it will continue to work with cities on their mobility challenges

    ['company', 'service', 'waze', 'carpooling', 'say']

  • IPHONE 14 NOTCH REDUCTION LIKELY EXPLAINED BY THIS APPLE PATENT

    https://9to5mac.com/2022/08/25/iphone-14-notch/

    08/25/2022, 21:28

    76.0% Shortened!

    Apple first introduced the notch design back in 2017, with the launch of the iPhone X

    For the iPhone 14, Apple is expected to be taking a different approach to the Pro and non-Pro models

    Patently Apple highlighted a patent application that may provide the explanation

    Today the US Patent & Trademark Office published a patent application from Apple that relates to Apple’s iPhone that may use a light-folded projector to reduce the footprint of components to maximize the display area and thereby decrease the size of the iPhone’s notch […] Apple notes in their patent application that the use of the light-folded projector can reduce footprint of the imaging and sensing components of a device to increase the display area for the device such as a device with bezels

    Translated from patent-speak, what Apple is describing is using a prism

    If Apple wanted to use a mirror instead, it would use a polished metal mirror, rather than a glass one

    ['iphone', 'notch', 'apple', 'component', 'patent']

    Apple first introduced the notch design back in 2017, with the launch of the iPhone X

    For the iPhone 14, Apple is expected to be taking a different approach to the Pro and non-Pro models

    Patently Apple highlighted a patent application that may provide the explanation

    Today the US Patent & Trademark Office published a patent application from Apple that relates to Apple’s iPhone that may use a light-folded projector to reduce the footprint of components to maximize the display area and thereby decrease the size of the iPhone’s notch […] Apple notes in their patent application that the use of the light-folded projector can reduce footprint of the imaging and sensing components of a device to increase the display area for the device such as a device with bezels

    Translated from patent-speak, what Apple is describing is using a prism

    If Apple wanted to use a mirror instead, it would use a polished metal mirror, rather than a glass one

    ['iphone', 'notch', 'apple', 'component', 'patent']

  • 4 'DATUKS' AMONG 8 HELD OVER RM100MIL LAND SCAM IN JOHOR

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/25/4-datuks-among-8-held-over-rm100mil-land-scam-in-johor/

    08/25/2022, 20:12

    62.5% Shortened!

    Johor police chief Kamarul Zaman Mamat said the three pieces of land, totalling 1,699.68ha, were worth just RM1.47 million when the state government awarded them to a statutory body in 1987

    They served as officers at the land office and as directors of a cooperative at the time,” he said

    Kamarul said an assistant land officer of the statutory body lodged a police report about the cheating case in January

    The complainant claimed that the three plots of land had been transferred to a private company without the knowledge and approval of the statutory body, he said

    “Investigations showed that before the land was transferred to the company, it was mortgaged to a cooperative in 1994,” he added

    So far, 28 witnesses comprising company directors, a company secretary, lawyers, liquidators, land office staff, and officers of the statutory body had been questioned by the Bukit Aman commercial crime department in connection with the case, he said

    ['police', 'arrest', 'transfer', 'land', 'say']

  • MALAYSIA NO 2 IN REGION FOR MALICIOUS EMAILS | FREE MALAYSIA TODAY

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/25/malaysia-no-2-in-region-for-malicious-emails/

    08/25/2022, 19:28

    62.5% Shortened!

    It said that as of mid-August, Malaysia was among the top five countries in Apac, including Vietnam, Japan, Indonesia and Taiwan, to accumulate 61.1% of the total malicious emails detected by Kaspersky Mail Antivirus

    Vietnam topped the list with 3.09 million spam emails detected, followed by Malaysia (2.36 million), Japan (1.86 million), Indonesia (1.80 million) and Taiwan (1.45 million)

    Kaspersky senior security researcher Noushin Shabab said the Apac region accounted for almost 24% of total global malicious emails detected this year

    “The Apac region has almost 60% of the world’s population

    “There is also the lingering pandemic aftermath, which led to lockdowns and work-from-home set-up in the region where people took their work computers home

    The partnership will see local entrepreneurs benefit from expert advertising solutions and a database of 15.8 million potential customers

    ['malicious', 'email', 'apac', 'detect', 'say']

    He said when the baby’s mother arrived at the 65-year-old babysitter’s apartment at 5.30pm to pick up her daughter, she was told that the babysitter’s 14-year-old granddaughter might have abducted the baby

    He said police managed to track down and detain the teenager in Machang Bubok, where she was found with her boyfriend and another friend, both 18, at 11.50pm

    Police found them with the baby in a factory van parked there,” he said

    As promised, Steelrising developer Spiders has launched the game's closed beta

    The beta is a pre-order bonus for buying either of the game's editions early, and sadly isn't available in any other way

    The Steelrising beta went live just a few minutes ago, and will continue to be available all the way until September 7, one day before the full game's worldwide release

    As you'd expect, the content of this beta is limited

    You'll have access to the game's first two levels, available to play as many times as you want

    Beta progress does not carry over to the full game, however, so think of it as more of a demo that'll help you get familiar with the game's combat and setting

  • RAZER INTRODUCES THE RAZER BASILISK V3 PRO

    https://www.kakuchopurei.com/2022/08/razer-introduces-the-razer-basilisk-v3-pro/

    08/25/2022, 16:28

    50.0% Shortened!

    Write what you are looking for and press enter to begin your search! Live News Razer Introduces The Razer Basilisk V3 Pro By Alleef Ashaari|August 25, 2022|0 Comment Razer has announced the Basilisk V3 Pro, a next-gen customizable wireless gaming mouse built for performance and complete customizability

    Being Razer’s most advanced gaming mouse to date, the Razer Basilisk V3 Pro sets a new standard for the enthusiast gaming community with a Razer HyperScroll Tilt Wheel, Razer Optical Mouse Switches Gen-3, 10+1 programmable buttons, Razer Focus Pro 30K Optical Sensor, wireless charging with Razer Mouse Dock Pro and Wireless Charging Puck (both sold separately), and more

    “The Basilisk V3 Pro is our most feature-rich gaming mouse to date, with all the bells and whistles to blow the competition out of the water,” said Chris Mitchell, Head of the PC Gaming Division at Razer

    “Essentially, the Basilisk V3 Pro gives gamers every feature they could ever want, and more customization options than ever before.” ABOUT THE RAZER BASILISK V3 PRO For more information on the Razer Basilisk V3 Pro, please see here

    ABOUT THE RAZER MOUSE DOCK PRO For more information on the Razer Mouse Dock Pro, please see here

  • DECISION TO USE PH LOGO TO COUNTER CLAIMS OF DIVIDED OPPOSITION, SAYS ANWAR

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/25/decision-to-use-ph-logo-to-counter-claims-of-divided-opposition-says-anwar/

    08/25/2022, 16:28

    60.0% Shortened!

    DAP and Amanah had used PH’s logo

    The PKR president said while his party would have preferred to use its own logo, what happened in Johor gave the impression the opposition was divided

    “People were saying that despite Anwar being the PH chairman and PKR president, the opposition was split

    Anwar, however, said he would leave the opposition parties in Sabah and Sarawak to decide for themselves if they preferred to contest under a single logo or their respective party banners

    Last night, DAP secretary-general Loke Siew Fook said the coalition had agreed “in principle” to use one logo for GE15

    In the last general election, PH was forced to contest under the PKR logo after the Registrar of Societies refused to approve the coalition’s registration as a body and its logo, citing problems with the documentation provided by Bersatu, which was then one of its component parties

    ['opposition', 'anwar', 'say', 'use', 'one']

    In the last general election, PH was forced to contest under the PKR logo after the Registrar of Societies refused to approve the coalition’s registration as a body and its logo, citing problems with the documentation provided by Bersatu, which was then one of its component parties

    ['opposition', 'anwar', 'say', 'use', 'one']

    In the UK the disc edition is going from £450 to £480, while in the EU it’s going from €500 to €550

    Basically, it can change the way you do low-light photography

    Google research called this new AI noise reduction tool RawNeRF under their open source project known as MultiNeRF

    The team behind the project claims that it works better than any other noise reduction tool out there

    In a video demonstration by a researcher Ben Mildenhall showed the use of NeRF in the Dark

    He used a smartphone photo of a candlelit table to demonstrate how the RawNeRF tool can help make the low-light photo effective

    08/25/2022, 15:28

    73.91% Shortened!

    Thursday, 25 Aug 2022

    Johor police chief Comm Datuk Kamarul Zaman Mamat

    Johor police chief Comm Datuk Kamarul Zaman Mamat said here on Thursday (Aug 25) the three plots of land in Kluang, belonging to the South-East Johor Development Authority (Kejora), had a market value of over RM100mil

    “The misappropriation was detected during an audit of its land bank (when it was) found that the oil palm land leased to the cooperative had its title transferred to another private company without Kejora's knowledge in the middle of last year

    He added that they were all members of the board of directors at the cooperative and were also working at the Land Office at that time

    Comm Kamarul Zaman Mamat

    72.73% Shortened!

    According to Oppo, the device retains its emphasis on photography, particularly in taking portraits, maintaining the Bokeh Flare Portrait feature present in previous Oppo devices that blurs the background while boosting the bokeh light spots to highlight the subject

    The Oppo Enco Buds2 are priced at RM129 and come in Midnight and Moonlight colour options

    The device will be available in two colour variants – Dawnlight Gold and Starlight Black – while featuring the company's Integrated Oppo Glow, a fingerprint resistant coating which also gives the device's backplate a shimmering appearance

    Those who purchase the device at Oppo's Portrait Carnival at the Sunway Velocity Mall before Aug 31 will also be eligible for a free pair of TWS earbuds (worth RM109), hotel vouchers (RM250), and a powerbank (RM79)

    Oppo also showed off their Enco Buds2, which like the Reno8 Z 5G will be available from Aug 26, which the company claims boasts a seven-hour battery life, with a total of 28 hours worth of charge stored in the charging case

    Both the Reno8 Z 5G and Enco Buds2 will be available at My Oppo Spaces, Oppo Brand Stores, Oppo Official Online Stores, Oppo Telco partners, Oppo ecommerce partners, and Oppo chain-store partners

    Separately, the party said leaders and members will be at the Kuala Lumpur court complex in solidarity with Amir

    This comes a week after two politicians and a student activist were charged at a magistrates’ court for failing to notify police over price hike protest gatherings last month

    The three – Amanah Youth chief Hasbie Muda, Batu PKR Youth chief Sabda Suluh Lestari Yahya and student activist Aliff Naif Mohd Fizam – were the organisers of three separate gatherings

    Previously, police had summoned 13 people involved in the protest over the controversial littoral combat ship (LCS) project

    The rally saw about 200 people gathering on Aug 14, urging Putrajaya to form a royal commission of inquiry into the project, and for defence minister Hishammuddin Hussein to resign for failing to take responsibility for the troubled project

    Stress urinary incontinence can be treated either non-surgically or surgically, depending on the individual’s comfort level

    Grab Malaysia’s #TechuntukSemua initiative integrates the PWD community within the workforce so they can become financially mobile.

    Najib arrived earlier at 8.26am for his RM2.28bil 1MDB embezzlement trial

    This is his first appearance in court after being sent to prison on Tuesday (Aug 23) following the Federal Court's dismissal of his final appeal in the SRC International Sdn Bhd case

    On Tuesday, Najib became the first former prime minister in the country's history to be sent to prison after the Federal Court upheld the High Court's conviction and sentence

    On July 28, 2020, the Kuala Lumpur High Court sentenced Najib to 12 years in jail and a total fine of RM210mil after being found guilty of seven charges of criminal breach of trust, money laundering and abuse of position in the RM42mil SRC International case

    08/25/2022, 14:09

    50.0% Shortened!

    Just over a month ago, Nothing launched the Phone 1

    With many smartphone manufacturers already starting the Android 13 beta program for their devices, Nothing CEO Carl Pei announced that the Phone 1 will get Android 13 beta sometime by the end of the year

    Pei made the statement after Nothing was facing criticism that the final update would only arrive in 2023

    Running on Android 12 out of the box, Carl Pei said they are not in a rush to update the Phone 1 ‘at the expense of user experience.’  Nothing OS based on Android 13 will be getting a stable release in early 2023

    This also applies to Nothing OS based on Android 13 where we aim to ship a beta version by the end of the year, with a full release in early 2023

    In case you didn’t know, the Nothing Phone 1 comes with stock Android and comes with almost no bloatware

  • MAYBANK POSTS 2Q NET PROFIT OF RM1.86BIL, DIV OF 28C/SHARE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/08/25/maybank-posts-2q-net-profit-of-rm186bil-div-of-28cshare

    08/25/2022, 13:28

    80.0% Shortened!

    Earnings per share dipped to 15.52 sen from 17.05 sen previously

    Year-to-date, the group has a cumulative net profit of RM3.9bil, down from RM4.35bil in the 2021 period

    The group’s CET1 capital ratio stood at 14.34%, and total capital ratio at 17.71% as at June 30, 2022, retaining its position as one of the best capitalised banks in the region

    On asset quality, gross impaired loans (GIL) ratio declined to 1.81% in June 2022 from 2.18% in June 2021

    Loan loss coverage remained at a healthy level of 122.3% as newly impaired loan formation remained low

    As at July 31, 2022, some 5.7% of the outstanding loan balance in Malaysia remain under relief programmes, while the portion in Singapore and Indonesia stood at 3.2% and 9.5% respectively.

    ['quarter', 'june', 'net', 'loan', 'growth']

    Earnings per share dipped to 15.52 sen from 17.05 sen previously

    Year-to-date, the group has a cumulative net profit of RM3.9bil, down from RM4.35bil in the 2021 period

    The group’s CET1 capital ratio stood at 14.34%, and total capital ratio at 17.71% as at June 30, 2022, retaining its position as one of the best capitalised banks in the region

    On asset quality, gross impaired loans (GIL) ratio declined to 1.81% in June 2022 from 2.18% in June 2021

    Loan loss coverage remained at a healthy level of 122.3% as newly impaired loan formation remained low

    As at July 31, 2022, some 5.7% of the outstanding loan balance in Malaysia remain under relief programmes, while the portion in Singapore and Indonesia stood at 3.2% and 9.5% respectively.

    08/25/2022, 13:09

    50.0% Shortened!

    While open-world games seem to take the centerstage, BGMI developer Krafton has given a glimpse of their upcoming title – Moonbreaker

    Created by the same studio that brought us Subnautica (Unknown Worlds), Moonbreaker is a turn-based tabletop RPG (Role Playing Game) sci-fi game

    The developers said players will be able to understand more about the world of Moonbreaker and its characters via upcoming audio dramas which will be unveiled just before the Early Access launch

    Players will have to efficiently make use of their resources, plan their roster and make the most out of the map

    The tabletop RPG allows players to paint their miniature figures, customise roster banners and offers professional digital painting tools to make it feel like a physical game

    It looks like the game will have more than 50 units available during the Early Access launch

    ['game', 'world', 'moonbreaker', 'player', 'make']

  • TWITCH MAKES BIG CHANGE TO PARTNERS' EXCLUSIVITY CLAUSE

    https://comicbook.com/gaming/news/twitch-partners-exclusivity-youtube-change/

    08/25/2022, 13:08

    62.5% Shortened!

    Twitch has announced that it has made a big change to where Partners can stream their content

    Now, Twitch is trying to find a middle ground as YouTube increases the pressure

    Twitch Partners can now live stream on YouTube and any other service they want under one condition

    They are not allowed to stream on both platforms concurrently, so if they want to stream on YouTube, they'd have to end their broadcast on Twitch and move over

    You can read Twitch's official stance on the matter below

    What do you think of this change from Twitch? Let me know in the comments or hit me up on Twitter @Cade_Onder

    ['twitch', 'change', 'partner', 'stream', 'platform']

    Twitch has announced that it has made a big change to where Partners can stream their content

    Now, Twitch is trying to find a middle ground as YouTube increases the pressure

    Twitch Partners can now live stream on YouTube and any other service they want under one condition

    They are not allowed to stream on both platforms concurrently, so if they want to stream on YouTube, they'd have to end their broadcast on Twitch and move over

    You can read Twitch's official stance on the matter below

    What do you think of this change from Twitch? Let me know in the comments or hit me up on Twitter @Cade_Onder

    ['twitch', 'change', 'partner', 'stream', 'platform']



  • TOUCH 'N GO EWALLET APP HAVING ISSUES, UNABLE TO COPE WITH HEAVY TRAFFIC FROM TNG NFC CARD SALES

    https://soyacincau.com/2022/08/25/touch-n-go-ewallet-app-issues-heavy-traffic-tng-nfc-card-sales-xrs/

    08/25/2022, 12:28

    45.45% Shortened!

    Multiple Touch ‘n Go eWallet users are reportedly having issues trying to use the Touch ‘n Go eWallet app

    It seems as though this heavy traffic is related to the sale of the Enhanced Touch ‘n Go card

    Touch ‘n Go users might’ve seen a notification from the eWallet app yesterday, informing them that sales of the NFC-enabled Enhanced Touch ‘n Go card would be happening today at 10am

    It solves one of the biggest issues when trying to reload a physical Touch ‘n Go card these days, which is that you can’t actually do it via the eWallet app, and instead you need to do it in-person

    With an Enhanced Touch ‘n Go card and a smartphone with NFC support, you’ll be able to reload directly into your physical Touch ‘n Go card’s balance using the eWallet app

    This is also just the latest issue that the Touch ‘n Go eWallet app would face in recent months

  • HALF OF CHINA HIT BY DROUGHT IN WORST HEATWAVE ON RECORD

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2022/08/25/half-of-china-hit-by-drought-in-worst-heatwave-on-record/24664

    08/25/2022, 12:28

    71.43% Shortened!

    A chart from the National Climate Centre showed Wednesday that swathes of southern China — including the Tibetan Plateau — were experiencing “severe” to “extraordinary” drought conditions

    The worst-affected area — the Yangtze river basin, stretching from coastal Shanghai to Sichuan province in China’s southwest — is home to over 370 million people and contains several manufacturing hubs including the megacity of Chongqing

    The China Meteorological Administration predicted continued high temperatures of up to 40 degrees Celsius (104 degrees Fahrenheit) in Chongqing and the provinces of Sichuan and Zhejiang Thursday

    “High temperatures have basically been alleviated in the regions of south China, Jiangxi and Anhui,” the meteorological administration said

    Record low water levels on the Yangtze River have also put pressure on the region’s hydropower generators, with the National Energy Administration pledging Wednesday to make up the shortfall by ramping up coal production

    Recent heat broke records in Sichuan, where one county recorded a temperature of 44 degrees Celsius (111 Fahrenheit) Wednesday

    ['chongqing', 'record', 'china', 'temperature', 'high']

    A chart from the National Climate Centre showed Wednesday that swathes of southern China — including the Tibetan Plateau — were experiencing “severe” to “extraordinary” drought conditions

    The worst-affected area — the Yangtze river basin, stretching from coastal Shanghai to Sichuan province in China’s southwest — is home to over 370 million people and contains several manufacturing hubs including the megacity of Chongqing

    The China Meteorological Administration predicted continued high temperatures of up to 40 degrees Celsius (104 degrees Fahrenheit) in Chongqing and the provinces of Sichuan and Zhejiang Thursday

    “High temperatures have basically been alleviated in the regions of south China, Jiangxi and Anhui,” the meteorological administration said

    Record low water levels on the Yangtze River have also put pressure on the region’s hydropower generators, with the National Energy Administration pledging Wednesday to make up the shortfall by ramping up coal production

    Recent heat broke records in Sichuan, where one county recorded a temperature of 44 degrees Celsius (111 Fahrenheit) Wednesday

    ['chongqing', 'record', 'china', 'temperature', 'high']



  • TAX MULTINATIONALS INSTEAD OF IMPOSING 10PC ONLINE SALES TAX ON LOW-VALUE GOODS, GUAN ENG TELLS PUTRAJAYA

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/25/tax-multinationals-instead-of-imposing-10pc-online-sales-tax-on-low-value-goods-guan-eng-tells-putrajaya/24660

    08/25/2022, 12:28

    50.0% Shortened!

    The party chairman and former finance minister said the government, if in search of extra revenue, could opt for a 15 per cent global tax on multinational enterprises (MNEs) instead, which would be more than sufficient to replace the 10 per cent online sales tax on all LVG whether from foreign or local suppliers

    "Would it not make more sense as well as compassion to rake in extra revenue from profitable MNEs instead of the lower income groups? "DAP had proposed that the 10 per cent sales tax on online purchases of LVG below RM500 from local suppliers should be waived instead of imposing the 10 per cent online sales on foreign suppliers to create a level playing field so that local suppliers can enjoy the same benefits as foreign suppliers

    He pointed out that the IRB said that the tax rate of 15 per cent would reallocate profits of more than USS$125 billion (RM556.62 billion) from about 100 of the world's largest and most profitable MNEs to all countries

    "Under the IRB multinational tax branch, there are close to 3,000 MNEs, which would mean extra hundreds of millions of extra revenue when the 15 per cent tax rate is implemented on January 1, 2023

    "With the extra revenue there is no need to impose the 10 per cent sales tax on all online sales for LVG below RM500 next year,” adding that the government has imposed a flat 10 per cent sales tax by January 1, 2023 on LVG below RM500 purchased online from foreign suppliers and delivered to Malaysia to create a level playing field with local suppliers

    Lim reminded that currently, LVG priced at RM500 and below are not subject to any tax when they are imported to Malaysia.

    ['per', 'cent', 'online', 'sale', 'tax']

    The party chairman and former finance minister said the government, if in search of extra revenue, could opt for a 15 per cent global tax on multinational enterprises (MNEs) instead, which would be more than sufficient to replace the 10 per cent online sales tax on all LVG whether from foreign or local suppliers

    "Would it not make more sense as well as compassion to rake in extra revenue from profitable MNEs instead of the lower income groups? "DAP had proposed that the 10 per cent sales tax on online purchases of LVG below RM500 from local suppliers should be waived instead of imposing the 10 per cent online sales on foreign suppliers to create a level playing field so that local suppliers can enjoy the same benefits as foreign suppliers

    He pointed out that the IRB said that the tax rate of 15 per cent would reallocate profits of more than USS$125 billion (RM556.62 billion) from about 100 of the world's largest and most profitable MNEs to all countries

    Lim reminded that currently, LVG priced at RM500 and below are not subject to any tax when they are imported to Malaysia.

    08/25/2022

    68.42% Shortened!

    Without further ado, here are some of the best K-pop songs that unapologetically embrace the title of noise music

    Kicking us off is EVERGLOW’s “DUN DUN,” one of the group’s most audacious and successful singles to date

    However, this track dips into an experimental, scratchy instrumental that borders on grating, but it still makes for an infectiously energetic track that packs an undeniable punch

    And, like its title suggests, it really does go hard

    Loaded with explosive instrumentation and a powerful, stomping rhythm, this track brought out the very best of CLC’s fearless, confident attitude

    The group has been unapologetically bold from the very beginning of their career, choosing to commit to their hard-hitting sound despite divisive attitudes about their music
