  • PH AGREES IN PRINCIPLE TO USE ONE LOGO FOR GE15

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/24/ph-agrees-in-principle-to-use-one-logo-for-ge15/

    08/24/2022

    66.67% Shortened!

    “We have agreed in principle that PH will be using one logo for GE15,” said Loke in his weekly online programme

    “It is just that PKR has suggested that minor changes be done on the logo to rebrand PH’s image.” The opposition coalition, he added, will discuss whether minor changes can be made to the logo

    “But whatever it is, I am pleased that we have decided (in) principle to use one logo for GE15,” added Loke

    In the last general election, PH was forced to contest under the PKR logo after the Registrar of Societies refused to approve the coalition’s registration as a body and its logo, citing problems with the documentation provided by Bersatu, which was then one of its component parties

    The issue of the logo cropped up again at the Johor state elections when PKR decided to use its own logo while DAP and Amanah decided to use the coalition’s logo

    Chaotic development in Umno expected On a separate matter, Loke said the chaos in Umno following the imprisonment of former prime minister Najib Razak was expected

    ['use', 'logo', 'loke', 'say', 'coalition']

    “We have agreed in principle that PH will be using one logo for GE15,” said Loke in his weekly online programme

    “It is just that PKR has suggested that minor changes be done on the logo to rebrand PH’s image.” The opposition coalition, he added, will discuss whether minor changes can be made to the logo

    “But whatever it is, I am pleased that we have decided (in) principle to use one logo for GE15,” added Loke

    In the last general election, PH was forced to contest under the PKR logo after the Registrar of Societies refused to approve the coalition’s registration as a body and its logo, citing problems with the documentation provided by Bersatu, which was then one of its component parties

    The issue of the logo cropped up again at the Johor state elections when PKR decided to use its own logo while DAP and Amanah decided to use the coalition’s logo

    Chaotic development in Umno expected On a separate matter, Loke said the chaos in Umno following the imprisonment of former prime minister Najib Razak was expected

    ['use', 'logo', 'loke', 'say', 'coalition']



  • FACEBOOK POST BY CHIEF JUSTICE'S HUSBAND A PERSONAL OPINION, SAY COPS

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/23/facebook-post-by-chief-justices-husband-a-personal-opinion-say-cops/

    08/23/2022, 22:05

    60.0% Shortened!

    Cheras district police chief Zam Halim Jamaluddin said the post by Zamani Ibrahim was a personal political opinion

    Zam said a report was lodged about Zamani’s Facebook post on Aug 18

    He added that Zamani’s post became viral after it was circulated by irresponsible parties

    Earlier today, Najib filed an application to recuse Tengku Maimun from hearing the appeal on grounds that Zamani had “negative sentiments” towards his leadership, which the latter had expressed in a Facebook post in the aftermath of the 14th general election

    In the post, Zamani spoke about the fall of the Barisan Nasional government on May 9, 2018, and that he was “happy because Najib had been dethroned”

    But Tengku Maimun said her husband’s Facebook post four years ago had no “nexus” to the SRC International case, adding that Najib was only charged in July that year

  • ‘BILLION DOLLAR WHALE’ CO-AUTHOR TOM WRIGHT: NAJIB FINALLY BEING ‘HELD PERSONALLY LIABLE AND RESPONSIBLE’ FOR 1MDB SCANDAL

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/23/billion-dollar-whale-co-author-tom-wright-najib-being-held-personally-liable-and-responsible-for-1mdb-scandal/24350

    08/23/2022, 21:05

    62.5% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 23 — Co-author of the book Billion Dollar Whale Tom Wright expressed his satisfaction at hearing that convicted former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak was behind bars tonight after the Federal Court upheld his guilty verdict over the multimillion-dollar SRC International Sdn Bhd corruption case

    He said that it has been seven years since he first wrote about the 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB) scandal, and Najib was finally being “held personally liable and responsible” for his actions

    He, however, cautioned that he was unsure if Najib is going to serve the full 12-year term

    “He ousted Malaysia’s attorney general, who was about to arrest him

    “With this verdict, Malaysia becomes only the second jurisdiction after Singapore to jail anyone in this scandal (Singapore jailed a number of private bankers who helped Low),” he added

    The decision marks a historic moment for Malaysian politics as the country will witness for the first time a former prime minister head to jail.

    ['dollar', 'whale', 'former', 'prime', 'minister']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 23 — Co-author of the book Billion Dollar Whale Tom Wright expressed his satisfaction at hearing that convicted former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak was behind bars tonight after the Federal Court upheld his guilty verdict over the multimillion-dollar SRC International Sdn Bhd corruption case

    He said that it has been seven years since he first wrote about the 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB) scandal, and Najib was finally being “held personally liable and responsible” for his actions

    He, however, cautioned that he was unsure if Najib is going to serve the full 12-year term

    “He ousted Malaysia’s attorney general, who was about to arrest him

    “With this verdict, Malaysia becomes only the second jurisdiction after Singapore to jail anyone in this scandal (Singapore jailed a number of private bankers who helped Low),” he added

    The decision marks a historic moment for Malaysian politics as the country will witness for the first time a former prime minister head to jail.

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/23/malaysia-second-country-to-jail-those-involved-in-1mdb-says-us-journalist/

    08/23/2022, 21:03

    Wright made the statement in a Twitter thread following news that the Federal Court had affirmed former prime minister Najib Razak’s conviction and sentence in the SRC International case

    With the decision, Najib has become the first former prime minister in the country to be jailed

    The Billion Dollar Whale book, which Wright co-wrote with Bradley Hope, chronicles the 1MDB corruption scandal, which also involves fugitive businessman Low Taek Jho, or Jho Low, as the alleged mastermind

    Both Wright and Hope were reporters in the Wall Street Journal (WSJ) who reported in 2015 on RM2.6 billion allegedly channelled into Najib’s bank account from the 1MDB funds

    Najib, who is the former Pekan MP, will begin serving his jail term immediately

    He then appealed the conviction to the appellate court, which upheld the High Court’s decision in December last year

    ['singapore', 'jail', '1mdb', 'scandal', 'wright']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 23 — Opposition Leader Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim commended the 12-year sentencing of former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak, a decision made by the Federal Court today

    He said that the unanimous decision by the five-member Federal Court bench showed the strength of the rakyat

    “This decision proves that the people are in power

    The people made a decision in 2018 to ensure an independent judiciary and a country free from corruption

    “It is the people’s decision that allows the judiciary to make professional and courageous decisions based on the facts and the law instead of political dictators and the powerful people that we have seen for decades,” the PKR president said in a video message on Facebook tonight

    The Federal Court upheld that decision today.

    ['najib', 'decision', 'make', 'federal', 'court']

  • GROUNDS OF DECISION ON NAJIB'S BID TO RECUSE CHIEF JUSTICE

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/grounds-decision-najibs-bid-recuse-chief-justice

    08/23/2022, 19:05

    80.0% Shortened!

    In my view, that does not mean that the legal threshold for bias and recusal has been met

    [5] The Federal Court, in Public Prosecutor v Tengku Adnan bin Tengku Mansor [2020] 5 MLJ 220, has recently affirmed that in order to recuse a judge the test is the ‘real danger of bias test’

    [6] The question is whether the grounds of the application to recuse successfully raise a real danger of bias

    This case stands for the proposition that the views of a spouse of a judge cannot in itself be used as a ground for recusal

    I do not see how this discloses any fear or real danger of bias sufficient to recuse me

    [15] Finally, the fact that certain other judges recused themselves in cases involving the appellant in this case does not itself present a reason for me to recuse myself in this case

    ['appeal', 'recuse', 'view', 'bias', 'court']

    In my view, that does not mean that the legal threshold for bias and recusal has been met

    [5] The Federal Court, in Public Prosecutor v Tengku Adnan bin Tengku Mansor [2020] 5 MLJ 220, has recently affirmed that in order to recuse a judge the test is the ‘real danger of bias test’

    [6] The question is whether the grounds of the application to recuse successfully raise a real danger of bias

    This case stands for the proposition that the views of a spouse of a judge cannot in itself be used as a ground for recusal

    I do not see how this discloses any fear or real danger of bias sufficient to recuse me

    [15] Finally, the fact that certain other judges recused themselves in cases involving the appellant in this case does not itself present a reason for me to recuse myself in this case

    ['appeal', 'recuse', 'view', 'bias', 'court']

    Yesterday, Rafizi claimed that Latiff’s “wife” was the owner of two companies that had siphoned funds from the LCS project

    He also said the schemes to misappropriate LCS funds using companies allegedly linked to Latiff, who was the then deputy defence minister, was no coincidence

    08/23/2022, 17:05

    “None, none,” he said when asked on a reported broadcast on Astro Awani regarding a special meeting involving Umno divisional leaders yesterday

    When approached by the media after speaking at the closing of Budget 2023 consultations held at the finance ministry here today, the prime minister was also asked on his meeting with several Umno leaders at Seri Perdana last night

    Ismail, who is also an Umno vice-president, said he was briefed on the party’s preparedness, as stated by its deputy president, Mohamad Hasan in a statement issued in Perak

    “The deputy president touched on the Umno divisional meetings, the party’s preparations for the 15th general election (GE15) and on strengthening the party,” he added

    On the reported calls made by Umno divisional leaders for GE15 to be held soon, Ismail said he was not aware of this as he was not at the meeting held at the party headquarters in Menara Dato Onn, Kuala Lumpur, yesterday

    ['say', 'meeting', 'umno', 'divisional', 'leader']



  • SYED SADDIQ FAILS TO GET KEY WITNESS STATEMENT IN CORRUPTION CASE

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/23/syed-saddiq-fails-to-get-key-witness-statement-in-corruption-case/

    08/23/2022, 16:38

    45.45% Shortened!

    This followed a decision by High Court judicial commissioner Azhar Abdul Hamid to dismiss the application by defence counsel Gobind Singh Deo for a copy of the recorded statement by the 13th prosecution witness, Rafiq Hakim Razali, the former Bersatu youth wing, or Armada, assistant treasurer

    Gobind applied for the statement, saying there were contradictions in Rafiq’s testimony in court and the one recorded by MACC

    According to him, the discrepancy was over the time and place where Syed Saddiq was alleged to have instructed Rafiq and Armada assistant secretary Ahmad Redzuan Mohamed Shafi to withdraw RM1 million and the purpose of a fundraising event in Muar

    Deputy public prosecutor Wan Shaharuddin Wan Ladin objected to the application on the grounds that the defence had failed to convince the court that it had met the requirements under Section 51 of the Criminal Procedure Code

    Syed Saddiq, 29, is charged as the then Bersatu youth chief, who was entrusted with control of its funds, with abetting Rafiq with criminal breach of trust involving RM1 million in funds belonging to the wing at CIMB Bank Bhd, Menara CIMB KL Sentral, Jalan Stesen Sentral 2, here on March 6, 2020

    He also faces two counts of engaging in money-laundering activities, namely two transactions of RM50,000 each, believed to be the proceeds from unlawful activities, from his Maybank Islamic Bhd account into his Amanah Saham Bumiputera account at a bank in Jalan Persisiran Perling, Taman Perling, Johor Bahru, on June 16 and 19, 2018

    ['defence', 'youth', 'syed', 'saddiq', 'statement']

    "We are not influenced by the other bodies (legislature and executive) although there is a lot of perception that a judge's decision is based on support towards a particular person or that the judgment is in disregard to a decision of the executive," he added

    "Those wanting to challenge the law as being unconstitutional will have to prove this to the court," he said

    The newly minted Oscar winner’s Q Scores have dropped significantly since he slapped Chris Rock onstage at the Academy Awards in March

    By July, his score dropped to 24

    On the other hand, Smith’s negative score more than doubled, from less than 10 to 26

    The average negative Q Score is about 16 or 17

    Smith’s negative Q score has leaped from 10 to 26, meaning that 26% of those surveyed have a “fair” or “poor” opinion of the actor

  • THAI CAPITAL BRACES FOR PROTESTS OVER PM'S TERM LIMIT

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2022/08/23/thai-capital-braces-for-protests-over-pms-term-limit/24267

    08/23/2022

    60.0% Shortened!

    The main opposition party, and nearly two-thirds of Thais questioned in an opinion poll, believe Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha, who took power in a 2014 coup, should step down by August 24 because his time as junta chief counts towards his term

    Prayuth, 68, was army chief when he mounted a coup in 2014 to overthrow an elected government

    He became a civilian prime minister in 2019 after an election held under a military-drafted constitution

    The main opposition Pheu Thai Party has petitioned the Constitutional Court to rule on how long Prayuth can stay in office

    It is not clear when the court would rule on the term limit

    The opposition says Prayuth's tenure as prime minister began in August 2014, a few months after the coup, and should therefore end this month

    ['prime', 'minister', 'court', 'opposition', 'prayuth']

    The main opposition party, and nearly two-thirds of Thais questioned in an opinion poll, believe Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha, who took power in a 2014 coup, should step down by August 24 because his time as junta chief counts towards his term

    Prayuth, 68, was army chief when he mounted a coup in 2014 to overthrow an elected government

    He became a civilian prime minister in 2019 after an election held under a military-drafted constitution

    The main opposition Pheu Thai Party has petitioned the Constitutional Court to rule on how long Prayuth can stay in office

    It is not clear when the court would rule on the term limit

    The opposition says Prayuth's tenure as prime minister began in August 2014, a few months after the coup, and should therefore end this month

    ['prime', 'minister', 'court', 'opposition', 'prayuth']

    So, there is a possibility that Barcelona might look to secure a low-cost signing in the attacking department to replace the departing duo, who scored 26 goals between them in the last season

    And, as per SPORT, manager Xavi Hernandez would ideally prefer a player like Luuk de Jong, who was on loan at Barcelona last season

    The Dutchman had signed from Sevilla on the transfer deadline day of the last summer as a replacement for Antoine Griezmann but struggled to make much of an impact upon arrival

    As per the report, Xavi would prefer a player like de Jong, who would accept being a substitute, continue training professionally and offer quality from the bench and deliver goals when needed, if both Depay and Aubameyang left

    Barcelona have reportedly been offered a chance to sign Andrea Belotti, Adnan Januzaj and Edinson Cavani

  • HOW TO DOWNLOAD ZOOM DESKTOP CLIENT

    https://www.techtimes.com/articles/279511/20220823/how-to-download-zoom-desktop-client.htm

    08/23/2022

    82.86% Shortened!

    You'll also see a "Call in meeting" button, which will help you call into a meeting

    Then, you can hit the "Start Meeting" button to begin your call

    If you want to join a call, then you'll click on "Join a meeting" button

    You can then search for a meeting, just as you would for a new meeting

    You can also control your meeting from your desktop

    You can lock the meeting, mute your microphone, and end the meeting

    ['zoom', 'button', 'want', 'also', 'meeting']

    You'll also see a "Call in meeting" button, which will help you call into a meeting

    Then, you can hit the "Start Meeting" button to begin your call

    If you want to join a call, then you'll click on "Join a meeting" button

    You can then search for a meeting, just as you would for a new meeting

    You can also control your meeting from your desktop

    You can lock the meeting, mute your microphone, and end the meeting

    ['zoom', 'button', 'want', 'also', 'meeting']



  • SARAWAK DEPUTY MINISTER WANTS HADI SACKED, BARRED FOR LIFE FROM ENTERING STATE AFTER ‘ROOTS OF CORRUPTION’ REMARK

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/23/sarawak-deputy-minister-wants-hadi-sacked-barred-from-entering-state-for-life-after-corruption-remark/24266

    08/23/2022, 14:05

    70.0% Shortened!

    Liwan, who is also state deputy utility and telecommunication minister, castigated Hadi for his recent disparaging remarks describing non-Muslims and non-Bumiputera as being the “roots of corruption” in the country

    Liwan said he remembered Hadi describing the Sarawak indigenuous community as “ignorant cawat” (loincloth-wearing) voters who did not know how to vote

    Liwan said corruption is not a social disease and cannot be ascribed to any one race or religion

    “To say the majority of those who chase illicit gains in Malaysia are non-Muslims and non-Bumiputera is just a sweeping comment without providing proper data and statistics

    On August 20, Hadi claimed that non-Muslims and non-Bumiputera made up the majority of those who formed the “roots of corruption”, even as he called for it to be stamped out

    “They then damage our politics as they are the roots for corruption and the majority of them are non-Muslims and non-Bumiputera,” Hadi, who is also Marang MP, said in his Facebook post.

    ['pa', 'hadi', 'sarawak', 'liwan', 'say']

  • NAJIB'S SRC FINAL APPEAL: SHAFEE MAKES SUDDEN APPEARANCE AND REQUESTS FOR ADJOURNMENT

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/najibs-src-final-appeal-shafee-makes-sudden-appearance-and-requests-adjournment

    08/23/2022

    79.31% Shortened!

    As Tuesday’s (Aug 23) session resumed after a brief recess, Najib's counsel Hisyam Teh Poh Teik informed the Federal Court panel that Shafee would be joining him in submitting the defence’s application to recuse the panel’s chairperson Chief Justice Tun Tengku Maimun Tuan Mat

    Springing into action 10 minutes later, Shafee informed the court that he was just informed of the defence’s application hours ago, and that he would only be submitting on a part of the application, while Hisyam will submit on the other grounds

    Shafee contended that he was ill-prepared to submit to the court on Tuesday, due to how late he was informed of the application, and with him being occupied with a symposium in Parliament, he asked the court for an adjournment until Wednesday morning to allow him to submit on the application

    The Chief Justice quipped to Shafee that the senior lawyer basically came to the court on Tuesday to seek an adjournment, to which Shafee answered in the affirmative

    However, Tengku Maimun swiftly struck down the defence’s request for an adjournment, and told Hisyam to proceed with his submissions for the recusal application

    Hisyam then proceeded with submissions on the recusal application, while Shafee exited the courtroom to attend to matters in Parliament

    ['shafee', 'submit', 'court', 'application', 'adjournment']

    As Tuesday’s (Aug 23) session resumed after a brief recess, Najib's counsel Hisyam Teh Poh Teik informed the Federal Court panel that Shafee would be joining him in submitting the defence’s application to recuse the panel’s chairperson Chief Justice Tun Tengku Maimun Tuan Mat

    Springing into action 10 minutes later, Shafee informed the court that he was just informed of the defence’s application hours ago, and that he would only be submitting on a part of the application, while Hisyam will submit on the other grounds

    Shafee contended that he was ill-prepared to submit to the court on Tuesday, due to how late he was informed of the application, and with him being occupied with a symposium in Parliament, he asked the court for an adjournment until Wednesday morning to allow him to submit on the application

    The Chief Justice quipped to Shafee that the senior lawyer basically came to the court on Tuesday to seek an adjournment, to which Shafee answered in the affirmative

    However, Tengku Maimun swiftly struck down the defence’s request for an adjournment, and told Hisyam to proceed with his submissions for the recusal application

    Hisyam then proceeded with submissions on the recusal application, while Shafee exited the courtroom to attend to matters in Parliament

  • HUMAN ERROR LED TO COSTLY LCS DESIGN CONTRACT, SAYS REPORT

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/23/human-error-led-to-costly-lcs-design-contract-says-report/

    08/23/2022, 13:03

    64.71% Shortened!

    Referring to this human error as “a series of common sense lapses”, BHIC’s recently declassified audit report stated that one such lapse was the appointment of Anuar Murad as LCS project director

    This contributed to the “vague and weak” initial contract awarded to DCNS for design, engineering and support of the LCS project

    “The design contract with DCNS was poorly negotiated with common sense lapses,” said the report

    The report also found that upon the recommendation of Anuar and then BNS managing director Ahmad Ramli Mohd Nor, payments were released to DCNS without project milestones or deliverables being met

    DCNS, now known as Naval Group, is a sub-contractor for the LCS project, tasked with assisting BNS in the construction of six frigates for the navy

    BHIC is the controlling shareholder of BNS

    ['report', 'bhic', 'design', 'contract', 'dcns']

    The report also found that upon the recommendation of Anuar and then BNS managing director Ahmad Ramli Mohd Nor, payments were released to DCNS without project milestones or deliverables being met

  • SULTAN SAYS WON'T BE RUSHED INTO MAKING A DECISION ON JOHOR’S WEEKEND

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/23/sultan-says-wont-be-rushed-into-making-a-decision-on-johors-weekend/24241

    08/23/2022, 12:38

    53.85% Shortened!

    The 63-year-old state monarch also told the state government to focus on Johor’s economic growth while he reconsiders the weekend proposal

    The state government was first reported reviewing the state’s official rest days on June 14 following complaints from the public

    Sultan Ibrahim decreed the change of the state’s weekend rest days to Friday and Saturday from Saturday and Sunday in 2013

    Since January 1, 2014, Johor has observed Friday and Saturday as its official weekend

    The change, was in fact, a reversion to the state’s original weekend that was in effect since Johor’s days as an Unfederated Malay State

    Johor only switched to a Saturday and Sunday weekend in 1994

    ['johor', 'state', 'saturday', 'official', 'weekend']

    The 63-year-old state monarch also told the state government to focus on Johor’s economic growth while he reconsiders the weekend proposal

    The state government was first reported reviewing the state’s official rest days on June 14 following complaints from the public

    Sultan Ibrahim decreed the change of the state’s weekend rest days to Friday and Saturday from Saturday and Sunday in 2013

    Since January 1, 2014, Johor has observed Friday and Saturday as its official weekend

    The change, was in fact, a reversion to the state’s original weekend that was in effect since Johor’s days as an Unfederated Malay State

    Johor only switched to a Saturday and Sunday weekend in 1994

    ['johor', 'state', 'saturday', 'official', 'weekend']



  • MANCHESTER UNITED NEW BOY CASEMIRO PERFECT FOR ENGLISH FOOTBALL - RAPHAEL VARANE

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/manchester-united-engman_utd/story/4728561/manchester-united-new-boy-casemiro-perfect-for-english-football-raphael-varane

    08/23/2022

    64.71% Shortened!

    Gab Marcotti and Don Hutchison debate whether Casemiro will suit Erik ten Hag's style of play

    "I know perfectly his quality, he can bring this balance to the team and his mentality," Varane said

    Varane joined United last summer in search of a new challenge, and the France international said Casemiro expressed the same reason when joining him in Manchester

    "I know exactly what he feels and why he's coming here after what he lived in Madrid," Varane added

    "He needs a new challenge, I know exactly what he feels, and I know exactly why he chose this club

    "It's difficult to explain why but we didn't start the games with the same intensity, with the same fighting spirit," Varane added

    ['casemiro', 'ten', 'hag', 'varane', 'say']

    "I know exactly what he feels and why he's coming here after what he lived in Madrid," Varane added

    "He needs a new challenge, I know exactly what he feels, and I know exactly why he chose this club

    "It's difficult to explain why but we didn't start the games with the same intensity, with the same fighting spirit," Varane added

    ['casemiro', 'ten', 'hag', 'varane', 'say']

    Astro is introducing Disney+ Hotstar app on the Ulti Box—something that only Ultra Box users had, previously

    However, you’d first need to have an active Disney+ Hotstar subscription

    “First launched on the Ultra Box earlier this year, from today, all Ulti Box customers with an active Disney+ Hotstar subscription will be able to enjoy the benefits of the Disney+ Hotstar app

    With the exciting addition of this popular streaming service, Ulti Box customers can now switch between hit local channels and the Disney+ Hotstar app’s library of endless entertainment without ever needing to leave the Astro interface,” wrote Astro in its press release

    If you’re new to Astro’s services, the Ulti Box is offered to new subscribers who sign up for the base “Primary Pack” that costs RM59.99 per month

    It’s just that other plans by Astro already come with Disney+ Hotstar without you needing to pay for a separate account

  • JOHOR RULER IN NO HURRY TO DECIDE ON STATE'S WEEKEND

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/23/johor-ruler-in-no-hurry-to-decide-on-states-weekend/

    08/23/2022, 12:05

    62.5% Shortened!

    Sultan Ibrahim said he wanted the government to focus on the state’s economic growth for the benefit of the people while he deliberated the decision, adding that there was “no need for any hullabaloo or politicising on the issue”

    He said an announcement would be made once he was “completely sure and confident that it would be the best decision for the good of Johor”

    Sultan Ibrahim said the state government may send him proposals which he will review thoroughly

    On June 14, menteri besar Onn Hafiz Ghazi said the state government would review the weekend rest days

    In 2014, Sultan Ibrahim had changed the state’s weekend to Friday and Saturday as a mark of respect for Friday’s importance to Muslims and as recognition of Islam as the state’s religion

    He had said this was a reversion of the state’s original weekend, which had been in effect since the time Johor was an unfederated Malay state

    ['sultan', 'ibrahim', 'say', 'make', 'decision']

    Both CAD and CED were appointed by the Boustead Naval Shipyard (BNS) to buy equipment from the original equipment manufacturer for the project

    The forensic audit report also highlighted the lack of structure and governance for the LCS project that started in 2010 and went unchecked until 2015

    The 104-page forensic audit report covered 21 LOAs, including variation orders, with a combined value of RM4.97 billion

    Ahmad Ramli was then chairman of LCSSC

    At the time of issuance of LOAs, Anuar signed as both a witness on behalf of BNS, as well as on behalf of CED when parent company CAD reassigned the awards to its subsidiary CED

    “In most of the cases, LOAs were issued to CAD or CED without being first presented to the LCSSC for their approval

    On the question whether he would vie for the party president’s post as the norm in Umno is that the party president becomes the prime minister, he replied his focus now was to help the party win the 15th General Election (GE15)

    "If the party loses, there’s no point in contesting for any position

    "As for me, I’m the prime minister, I am the party’s vice-president and though I’m not the party president, I still want to see the party win and form the government," he said

    08/23/2022, 10:01

    Tuesday, 23 Aug 2022

    There were 244 decliners on the market compared with 75 gainers for a deeply negative market breadth

    Stocks in decline included PETRONAS Chemicals down three sen to RM8.67, Tenaga Nasional sliding five sen to RM8.54 and Press Metal shedding five sen to RM4.63

    CIMB however dropped four sen to RM5.27 while RHB shed one sen to RM5.82

    In plantations, Sime Darby Plantation fell seven sen to RM4.43 and IOI dipped two sen to RM4.17

    MISC was one of the rare gainers, adding seven sen to RM7.06

    Among actives, Sapura Energy rose one sen to five sen, Cnergenz gained two sen to 90.5 sen and Bintai Kinden slid 0.5 sen to nine sen.

  • MANCHESTER UNITED'S PLAYERS RAN 19KM MORE AGAINST LIVERPOOL THAN IN THE MISERABLE LOSS AT BRENTFORD

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11136965/Manchester-Uniteds-players-ran-19km-against-Liverpool-miserable-loss-Brentford.html

    08/23/2022

    64.71% Shortened!

    Manchester United ran 19km more against Liverpool than in the poor 4-0 defeat to Brentford United had a much higher success rate than Liverpool in duels, as they made 11 more tackles It wasn't only about the distance United covered, they made a huge total of 155 sprints compared to the 65 that they made against the Bees.  The high-pressing style of play led to plenty more interceptions as they had 12, double Jurgen Klopp's side total of six during the match

    Those goals came despite a lack of possession with just 29.6 per cent against Liverpool while they had 67 per cent against Brentford

    United saw Raphael Varane, Bruno Fernandes and Diogo Dalot booked in the victory at Old Trafford

    This week, the free-kick count was only 11-7 against the hosts.  United also only mustered two corners last time out and improved that total to six in the win over Liverpool

    United improved their discipline, although Bruno Fernandes was booked in both matches United made a total of 273 passes, 57 being long passes, with a passing accuracy of 65.9 per cent during the win over title challengers Liverpool

    A key statistic being the passing accuracy in the opponents' half which was a total of 53.6 per cent while they only had a 12.5 per cent crossing accuracy in their total of eight crosses.  It's crazy what difference a week can make and of course a few tweaks with the former Ajax manager making the bold decision to drop captain Harry Maguire and superstar forward Cristiano Ronaldo from the starting line-up

    ['united', 'liverpool', 'week', 'make', 'total']

    Barcelona’s coaching staff is still very impressed with the winger, though, which is possibly why the club is yet to sanction a loan exit for him

    Kessie adds offensive depth to Barcelona’s midfield as a box-to-box midfielder

    As for Memphis, he will leave on a free transfer, likely to Juventus, but his salary of €4.5 million is significant enough to help Barcelona

  • FCC LISTING REVEAL NEW DETAILS OF SONY’S ALLEGEDLY UPCOMING XPERIA 5 IV SMARTPHONE

    https://www.lowyat.net/2022/282746/fcc-listing-reveal-new-details-of-sonys-allegedly-upcoming-xperia-5-iv-smartphone/

    08/23/2022

    57.14% Shortened!

    According to the FCC listing, the Sony Xperia 5 IV measures at 155.74 mm in length and 67.1 mm in width, while its display is recorded at 153.5mm – equivalent to 6.04-inches

    Surprisingly, this suggests that the fourth iteration of the smartphone is slightly smaller than its predecessor, which measures at 6.1-inches

    Additionally, the listing also suggests that it will also be equipped with wireless charging capability, which is a first for Sony’s compact flagship smartphone model

    Unfortunately, the listing did not provide any details on the allegedly upcoming smartphone’s key specifications such as its chipset, memory capacities, battery size and so on

    If this sounds familiar to you, that’s because it is the same setup as the Xperia 5 III, which is kind of disappointing if this detail is accurate

    It is not known when Sony is expected to launch the Xperia 5 IV at this time, though it seems that the phone is arriving later than expected

    ['sony', 'xperia', 'listing', 'smartphone', 'fcc']

  • RELEASE REPORT ON PATROL VESSEL PROJECT TOO, SAYS PAC CHIEF

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/22/release-report-on-patrol-vessel-project-too-says-pac-chief/

    08/23/2022, 00:25

    60.0% Shortened!

    The New Generation Patrol Vessel project called for the construction of 27 patrol vessels, but only six ships were eventually completed, with the cost going up from RM5.35 billion to a total of RM6.75 billion through an additional contract

    A PAC report two weeks ago said that funds meant for the troubled RM9 billion littoral combat ship project had been used to resolve debts from the NGPV project

    PAC chief Wong Kah Woh called for the NGPV report to be declassified since the LCS contractor, Boustead Naval Shipyard, had used funds meant for that project to resolve debts related to the patrol vessel project

    ‘Another Boustead audit needed on LCS’ Wong also urged the Cabinet to order the shipyard’s controlling shareholder Boustead Heavy Industries Corporation to conduct a further forensic audit on the late delivery of navy frigates in the LCS project

    He said the report showed that there had yet to be an in-depth probe into all activities related to the project’s implementation up until 2018, which meant that some important facts could have been left out

    Boustead Holdings Bhd then became the majority shareholder of PSC-Naval Dockyard, which was then renamed Boustead Naval Shipyard in 2006

    ['report', 'naval', 'vessel', 'project', 'billion']

    The New Generation Patrol Vessel project called for the construction of 27 patrol vessels, but only six ships were eventually completed, with the cost going up from RM5.35 billion to a total of RM6.75 billion through an additional contract

    A PAC report two weeks ago said that funds meant for the troubled RM9 billion littoral combat ship project had been used to resolve debts from the NGPV project

    PAC chief Wong Kah Woh called for the NGPV report to be declassified since the LCS contractor, Boustead Naval Shipyard, had used funds meant for that project to resolve debts related to the patrol vessel project

    ‘Another Boustead audit needed on LCS’ Wong also urged the Cabinet to order the shipyard’s controlling shareholder Boustead Heavy Industries Corporation to conduct a further forensic audit on the late delivery of navy frigates in the LCS project

    He said the report showed that there had yet to be an in-depth probe into all activities related to the project’s implementation up until 2018, which meant that some important facts could have been left out

    Boustead Holdings Bhd then became the majority shareholder of PSC-Naval Dockyard, which was then renamed Boustead Naval Shipyard in 2006

    The Realme Pad X which comes with 6GB RAM and 128GB of storage is officially priced at RM1,699 in Malaysia

    For note-taking and illustrations, the Realme Pad X also comes with a Realme Pencil which offers 4,096 levels of pressure sensitivity and a 240Hz sampling rate

    According to Realme, you can use it to write for 25 minutes with a quick 1-minute charge, and up to 10.6 hours with a full charge

    Out of the box, it runs on Realme UI 3.0 based on Android 12

    Overall, the Realme Pad X is 7.1mm thin and weighs 506g for the 5G version

    ['rm1', 'tablet', 'realme', 'malaysia', 'pad']

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/court-appoints-interim-liquidator-take-control-serba-dinamik-after-it-missed-payment-under

    08/23/2022

    75.0% Shortened!

    These six banks — the petitioners that had requested for the appointment of an IL — are Standard Chartered Saadiq Bhd, HSBC Amanah Malaysia Bhd, AmBank Islamic Bhd, MIDF Amanah Investment Bank Bhd, United Overseas Bank (Malaysia) Bhd and Bank Islam Malaysia Bhd

    "The IL is an officer of the court and subject to the court's control

    Serba Dinamik and its three subsidiaries — Serba Dinamik International Ltd, Serba Dinamik Group Bhd and Serba Dinamik Sdn Bhd — were represented by Mak Lin Kum

    "The issue [that] must be kept in the forefront of my lord's mind is that parties are bound by the terms of the Consent Order, and the court, as well as all parties before the court, must give effect to the terms of the Consent Order

    "Simply put, that means in the event of failure of Serba Dinamik to comply with the payment terms on Aug 12, they will not object to the appointment of the IL," he said

    Banks reach settlement with Serba Dinamik on scheme of arrangement

    He will come back and he wants to become the prime minister once again,” Mahathir added

    Representatives for Najib declined to comment

    In Mahathir’s second term as prime minister from 2018, dozens of criminal charges were filed against Najib for corruption, money laundering and criminal breach of trust

    “It’s mind blowing.” A national election this time around would be much closer, Mahathir said, and no party is likely to win outright

    His new party could form a minority government and Mahathir said he didn’t rule out a coalition with Anwar again, despite earlier squabbles over succession plans.  Still, Mahathir said he isn’t interested in becoming prime minister for a third time

  • MAHATHIR SEES '50-50 CHANCE' OF NAJIB GETTING 1MDB PARDON

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/22/mahathir-sees-50-50-chance-of-najib-getting-1mdb-pardon/

    08/22/2022, 21:24

    66.67% Shortened!

    He will come back and he wants to become the prime minister once again,” Mahathir said in an interview with the Bloomberg news agency today

    He has appealed against the conviction and sentence, and the case is being heard by the Federal Court, with Najib’s counsel instructed by the court to make his submissions tomorrow

    Mahathir said that should the court uphold Najib’s conviction and jail sentence, “of course he’s going to ask for a pardon”

    If the Federal Court upholds Najib’s conviction, he will go to jail and will not be able to contest in the next general election, which must be held by September next year

    Mahathir said the next general election would be much closer, with no party likely to win outright

    However, people in his party “get very upset if I say I’m not contesting,” he said

    ['mahathir', 'najib', 'pardon', 'say', 'year']

    He will come back and he wants to become the prime minister once again,” Mahathir said in an interview with the Bloomberg news agency today

    He has appealed against the conviction and sentence, and the case is being heard by the Federal Court, with Najib’s counsel instructed by the court to make his submissions tomorrow

    Mahathir said that should the court uphold Najib’s conviction and jail sentence, “of course he’s going to ask for a pardon”

    If the Federal Court upholds Najib’s conviction, he will go to jail and will not be able to contest in the next general election, which must be held by September next year

    Mahathir said the next general election would be much closer, with no party likely to win outright

    However, people in his party “get very upset if I say I’m not contesting,” he said

    ['mahathir', 'najib', 'pardon', 'say', 'year']

    - After Musk's joke, which other billionaires could buy United? There is, though, a debate about whether Casemiro is the right man for Ten Hag's system

    It is more evidence that Casemiro is a compromise for Ten Hag, but one that he couldn't turn down

    Regardless of age, wage and transfer fee, Casemiro has filled a desperate need for United in a position that was a problem long before Ten Hag arrived

    If Casemiro makes United better, on and off the pitch, then it will have been worth it.

  • ISMAIL SABRI: PARLIAMENT AND JUDICIARY TO BE STRENGTHENED

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/08/22/ismail-sabri-parliament-and-judiciary-to-be-strengthened

    08/22/2022, 19:29

    71.43% Shortened!

    Looking on are (from left) Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Parliament and Law) Datuk Seri Dr Wan Junaidi Tuanku Jaafar, Works Minister Datuk Seri Fadilah Yusof, Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Economy) Datuk Seri Mustapa Mohamed and Symposium director Dr Kamarul Zaman Yusoff

    Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob said the memorandum of understanding with the Opposition had resulted in initiatives proposed by the government to get strong support from all parties

    Ismail Sabri was sworn in as Malaysia’s ninth prime minister on Aug 21, 2021

    Ismail Sabri also expressed his gratitude to the Yang di-Pertuan Agong and the Malay Rulers for their support

    He also said plans were underway to strengthen the Parliament and judicial institutions for a healthier political landscape

    “By strengthening the Parliament and the judiciary and tabling the Political Fund Act, we hope to create a healthier political landscape for the country,” he said

    ['ismail', 'sabri', 'minister', 'parliament', 'political']

    Looking on are (from left) Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Parliament and Law) Datuk Seri Dr Wan Junaidi Tuanku Jaafar, Works Minister Datuk Seri Fadilah Yusof, Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Economy) Datuk Seri Mustapa Mohamed and Symposium director Dr Kamarul Zaman Yusoff

    Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob said the memorandum of understanding with the Opposition had resulted in initiatives proposed by the government to get strong support from all parties

    Ismail Sabri was sworn in as Malaysia’s ninth prime minister on Aug 21, 2021

    Ismail Sabri also expressed his gratitude to the Yang di-Pertuan Agong and the Malay Rulers for their support

    He also said plans were underway to strengthen the Parliament and judicial institutions for a healthier political landscape

    “By strengthening the Parliament and the judiciary and tabling the Political Fund Act, we hope to create a healthier political landscape for the country,” he said

    ['ismail', 'sabri', 'minister', 'parliament', 'political']



  • REPORT: MAJORITY OF UMNO DIVISION HEADS REJECT MOTION PERSUADING PM TO INTERVENE IN NAJIB’S SRC CASE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/22/report-majority-of-umno-division-heads-reject-motion-persuading-pm-to-intervene-in-najibs-src-case/24109

    08/22/2022, 19:29

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 22 — The majority of the Umno division heads who attended the party’s emergency meeting today have rejected a motion to push Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob to intercede in Datuk Seri Najib Razak’s SRC trial

    “The communications chairman was also forced to come to the meeting

    In the meeting, we were asked to urge the PM to intervene in the court case but many disagreed

    Many division heads were opposed to it because it is an abuse of power and will affect Umno if it is seen intervening in court cases,” the source told Astro Awani

    The source also said that many Umno division heads believe that should the prime minister get involved in Najib’s court cases, it would cause the party to lose at GE15

    Earlier, SuaraTV reported that an emergency meeting between Umno division heads with the party president this afternoon was said to be aimed at urging Ismail Sabri to intervene in the court case

    ['umno', 'division', 'head', 'meeting', 'source']

    As it stands, people can still challenge the constitutionality of the definition

    Barriers to marriage equality The constitution would need to be amended to shield the definition of marriage from further constitutional challenges, Lee said, a move that is likely to sail through parliament if undertaken as the ruling People’s Action Party has a more than two-thirds majority

    The LGBTQ community said the repeal “is the first step on a long road towards full equality”

    But they opposed any further laws and constitutional changes to protect the traditional definition of marriage as they would promote unequal treatment

    “The two women were taken to an area in Serdang and during the journey, the suspects took jewellery and cash belonging to the victims

    He said further investigations revealed that the 40-year-old suspect had 18 prior arrests for criminal and drug offences, while the 35-year-old suspect had 13 prior arrests

    Farouk said the two suspects were brought to the Ampang court today for a remand application under Section 117 of the Criminal Procedure Code to assist in investigations

  • SYED SADDIQ FAILS IN BID TO CHALLENGE CREDIBILITY OF KEY WITNESS

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/22/syed-saddiq-fails-in-bid-to-challenge-credibility-of-key-witness/

    08/22/2022, 15:24

    60.0% Shortened!

    The defence wanted to challenge the credibility of the 13th prosecution witness, Rafiq Hakim Razali, who is the former Angkatan Bersatu Anak Muda (Armada) assistant treasurer, following discrepancies between his testimony in court and the statement recorded from him by the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) in 2020 on the withdrawal of RM1 million from Armada’s bank account

    Judicial commissioner Azhar Abdul Hamid, when handing down his decision, said there was no need to challenge the credibility of the witness

    Therefore, the application by defence to challenge the credibility of the witness is dismissed,” he said

    Lawyer Gobind Singh Deo, representing Syed Saddiq, then requested that a copy of the witness statement recorded by MACC be handed over to the defence, and the court set this afternoon to hear the application

    On July 25, the High Court ordered the prosecution to give a copy of the witness statement recorded by MACC in 2020 to the court for scrutiny and consideration

    On the second charge, Syed Saddiq is alleged to have misused property for himself, namely RM120,000 from the Maybank Islamic Bhd account belonging to Armada Bumi Bersatu Enterprise, by causing Rafiq Hakim to dispose of the money between April 8 and 21, 2018

    “Najib’s action of undertaking a sumpah laknat at the Kampung Baru Mosque yesterday is regrettable

    “It is an attempt to play on religious sentiment among his supporters while the Federal Court is in session with his trial

    On Sunday night, the former prime minister uttered a sumpah laknat (swearing in the face of divine retribution) at Kampung Baru Mosque, saying he was not aware if the RM42 million came directly or indirectly from SRC

    On August 16, the Federal Court had unanimously dismissed Najib’s legal team’s request to postpone hearing his final appeal against his conviction of misappropriating funds from SRC International Sdn Bhd that would send the former prime minister straight to jail for 12 years and pay a RM210 million fine if upheld.

    Penang PAS committee member Abdul Razib Abd Rahim said the state committee supported the central committee’s ummah unification agenda

    “Penang is well known for being the heartland of Pakatan Harapan (PH)-DAP, so the agenda of unifying Malay parties is even more important here to prevent PH from taking advantage of any split in Malay-Muslim votes,” he said

    “The slogan ‘Islam unites the ummah’ should be backed by all PAS supporters, so that efforts to unite Malay political parties are successful and in line with shariah and party policy.” Razib said the parties, which he did not name, must be committed towards this cause to ensure Malay-Muslim interests were not denied and neglected in Penang

    “Penang PAS calls for all parties to forgo their personal interests in GE15, and ensure that the Malay-Muslim vote can be united for the well-being and harmony of the people,” he said

    Previously, PAS secretary-general Takiyuddin Hassan said some divisions had proposed to strengthen the ummah and Muafakat Nasional (MN) in line with the party’s stance

    “We have 197 divisions nationwide submitting their motions to PAS central for debate at the party’s 68th annual assembly on Sept 3 and 4

    He said PAS would continue to avoid clashes with Umno in GE15 because it would be detrimental to the solidarity of the ummah

  • APEX COURT MAY RULE EVEN WITHOUT SUBMISSIONS IN NAJIB'S CASE — LAWYERS

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/apex-court-may-rule-even-without-submissions-najibs-case-%E2%80%94-lawyers

    08/22/2022, 14:29

    72.73% Shortened!

    The court had set Aug 15 to 19 and Aug 23 to 26 to hear the appeal

    Lawyer Mohamed Haniff Khatri Abdulla said this is because the court could decide based on the written submissions filed previously by Najib's defence team at the Court of Appeal last year

    Lawyer Lim Wei Jiet also concurred, saying that as the country's highest court, it will likely decide based on the grounds of appeal in the memorandum of appeal, appeal records as well as the Court of Appeal's previous submissions by Najib's defence team

    The lawyer once again asked the court to postpone the hearing to Thursday (Aug 25) as he has other cases on Tuesday (Aug 23) and Wednesday (Aug 24), but it was rejected by the court as well

    On Aug 16, the court dismissed Hisyam's application to postpone the appeal hearing and ordered the appeal to proceed on Aug 18

    Last year, the Court of Appeal upheld the High Court's decision and dismissed Najib's appeal to set aside his conviction and jail sentence as well as the fine

    ['aug', 'datuk', 'najib', 'appeal', 'submission']

    The court had set Aug 15 to 19 and Aug 23 to 26 to hear the appeal

    Lawyer Mohamed Haniff Khatri Abdulla said this is because the court could decide based on the written submissions filed previously by Najib's defence team at the Court of Appeal last year

    Lawyer Lim Wei Jiet also concurred, saying that as the country's highest court, it will likely decide based on the grounds of appeal in the memorandum of appeal, appeal records as well as the Court of Appeal's previous submissions by Najib's defence team

    The lawyer once again asked the court to postpone the hearing to Thursday (Aug 25) as he has other cases on Tuesday (Aug 23) and Wednesday (Aug 24), but it was rejected by the court as well

    On Aug 16, the court dismissed Hisyam's application to postpone the appeal hearing and ordered the appeal to proceed on Aug 18

    Last year, the Court of Appeal upheld the High Court's decision and dismissed Najib's appeal to set aside his conviction and jail sentence as well as the fine

    ['aug', 'datuk', 'najib', 'appeal', 'submission']



  • RAFIZI CLAIMS LCS PROJECT FUNNELLED MONEY TO OFFSHORE COMPANIES OWNED BY WIFE OF FORMER DEPUTY MINISTER

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/08/22/rafizi-claims-lcs-project-funnelled-money-to-offshore-companies-owned-by-wife-of-former-deputy-minister/24050

    08/22/2022, 14:24

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Aug 22 — PKR deputy president Rafizi Ramli claimed money for the littoral combat ship (LCS) project was funnelled into offshore companies owned by the wife of a former deputy minister

    Rafizi said, in a statement, he received this information from internal investigations into the LCS scandal and from cross-checking with the database of offshore companies in the Paradise Papers, a 2017 tranche of leaked confidential records related to offshore investments

    He added that it would have been impossible for then Finance Minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak and then Defence Minister Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi to not have known about this as it occurred with projects that they both managed

    Last Thursday, Rafizi claimed that RM192 million had been funnelled from the LCS project to nonexistent, untraceable offshore accounts

    Fake companies are set up all over the world whose name is identical to a real company

    “The invoice is sent from one company, but the payment instructions are for the invoice to be paid to an account registered under a company whose name is almost the same but a different company,” Rafizi said.

    ['rafizi', 'lcs', 'project', 'offshore', 'company']

    08/22/2022, 13:24

    45.45% Shortened!

    Monday, 22 Aug 2022

    Kedah and Perlis state MMEA director Maritime First Admiral Romli Mustafa said the yacht was seized at about 6.55pm on Sunday (Aug 21) when it anchored 0.2 nautical miles (370m) north-east of Pulau Tuba

    "The two owners of the yacht and two crew members, aged between 46 and 56, failed to show authorities any valid document (allowing them) to conduct recreational activities at sea," he said in a statement on Monday (Aug 22)

    The crew and owners of the yacht were detained and taken to the Bukit Malut maritime jetty to help with the investigation while the tourists were released, First Adm Romli said

  • MARIA ALLOWED TO MOUNT CHALLENGE AGAINST SHARIAH COURT'S CONTEMPT ORDER

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/22/court-grants-marias-bid-to-begin-challenge-over-shariah-court-contempt-order/

    08/22/2022, 10:24

    66.67% Shortened!

    Judge Wan Ahmad Farid Wan Salleh granted Maria leave to commence her judicial review during an online proceeding today

    “She has come to court, complaining that her rights under Article 5 of the Federal Constitution are at stake as the contempt procedure under the Syariah Court Civil Procedure (Federal Territories) Act is unconstitutional

    “It does not matter if she is an MP or hawker, the court will not stand idly blind

    The court also made an order for the proceedings before the shariah courts to be stayed pending disposal of her judicial review hearing

    In her bid to initiate a judicial review, Maria wants the High Court to quash a shariah court order on Oct 14, 2019 that allowed businessman SM Faisal SM Nasimuddin to initiate contempt proceedings against her

    The shariah high court also sentenced Maria to seven days’ jail for contempt of court on April 25

    ['court', 'maria', 'order', 'shariah', 'contempt']

    08/22/2022

    60.0% Shortened!

    Now, it looks like the company is offering free shipping for eligible items to Malaysia

    It’s important to stress that only eligible items apply, and these will be marked with a “FREE Delivery” label on their respective item pages

    This free shipping is also automatically applied at checkout, marked as “FREE International Standard Delivery”

    It’s also worth mentioning that this free shipping deal looks to be a limited time thing, with different items showing a different time window

    From a quick search, it looks like products from the same seller will also have the same free shipping window, but beyond that, the reason for this is unclear

    It’s also unclear if Amazon Singapore will bring these free shipping offers back in the future once they expire this time around

    ['amazon', 'singapore', 'malaysia', 'look', 'free']

    60.0% Shortened!

    A total of 1,409 people, or 3.6% of active Covid-19 cases, were being treated in hospitals on Sunday, with 69, or 0.2% of the total, warded in intensive care units (ICU)

    Malaysia's current overall ICU utilisation rate stands at 60.8% while the ICU utilisation rate for Covid-19 patients is at 18.5%

    The Health Ministry's GitHub data repository reported that there were nine deaths due to Covid-19 on Sunday, bringing the total number of fatalities due to Covid-19 to 36,145 since the pandemic began

  • MAN BREAKS TEMPLE FURNITURE IN PENANG

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/08/22/man-breaks-temple-furniture-in-penang

    08/22/2022, 09:24

    66.67% Shortened!

    The grainy clips showed a man shouting “siau lang” (meaning maniac) in Hokkien while destroying furniture at a Taoist temple in Batu Itam, Balik Pulau

    In multiple videos that have since gone viral on social media, the man – carrying a backpack and wearing a yellow long-sleeved shirt and a pair of jeans – went on wrecking spree, destroying the temple furniture in the foyer

    The footage also showed him desecrating the temple by urinating in front of the shuttered doors to the shrine hall

    OCPD Supt Kamarul Rizal Jenal said they were made aware of the incident yesterday after two videos of the man misbehaving at the temple grounds began circulating on social media

    Supt Kamarul said the case would be investigated under Section 295 of the Penal Code for defiling a place of worship with intent to insult the religion of any class and Section 427 of the Penal Code for committing mischief

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['man', 'video', 'temple', 'balik', 'pulau']

    The grainy clips showed a man shouting “siau lang” (meaning maniac) in Hokkien while destroying furniture at a Taoist temple in Batu Itam, Balik Pulau

    In multiple videos that have since gone viral on social media, the man – carrying a backpack and wearing a yellow long-sleeved shirt and a pair of jeans – went on wrecking spree, destroying the temple furniture in the foyer

    The footage also showed him desecrating the temple by urinating in front of the shuttered doors to the shrine hall

  • RELATIVE OF NZ CHILDREN FOUND DEAD IN SUITCASES BELIEVED TO BE IN S.KOREA -POLICE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/08/22/relative-of-nz-children-found-dead-in-suitcases-believed-to-be-in-skorea--police

    08/22/2022, 09:07

    53.85% Shortened!

    Police and forensic investigators gather at the scene where suitcases with the remains of two children were found, after a family, who are not connected to the deaths, bought them at an online auction for an unclaimed locker, in Auckland, New Zealand, August 11, 2022 in this still image taken from video

    The woman, a Korean-born New Zealander, arrived in South Korea in 2018 and had no record of departure since then, a police officer told Reuters

    "New Zealand police had requested confirmation whether the person who might be related to a crime case was in South Korea," the police officer said, adding that given her past address and age, she could be the mother of the kids

    New Zealand police launched a homicide inquiry in Auckland this month after the remains of the children were found by a family going through the contents of a storage locker they had purchased unseen

    The children were aged between 5 and 10 years and had been dead for some time, New Zealand police have said

    The family who found the bodies were not connected to the deaths

    ['police', 'child', 'found', 'family', 'new']

  • NEGLIGENT PARENTS SHOULD BE PUNISHED

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/08/22/negligent-parents-should-be-punished

    08/22/2022, 07:24

    81.82% Shortened!

    They would have to think of the implications, for example, if the father is the family’s breadwinner and having him sentenced to jail would only worsen the family situation,” she said

    After seeing the promising effect in a case where a parent was held responsible for his child’s involvement in mat lajak activities, Bukit Aman Traffic Investigation and Enforcement Department principal assistant director (enforcement) Supt Dr Bakri Zainal Abidin hoped similar action would also be taken against those who allowed their children to drive without licences

    “There was a mosquito bike case (mat lajak) in Selangor where we decided to take action against the parent under the Child Act 2001

    “So, we want the DPP to impose stern punishment (on parents who allow their children to drive without licences) so that this can serve as a lesson to the community

    So far, underage drivers and those who allow minors to drive their vehicles would only be issued with compounds

    “We have to ensure that if an underage child drives without a licence and someone gets killed (as a result), the parents should be given maximum sentences too

    ['child', 'parent', 'case', 'drive', 'say']

    They would have to think of the implications, for example, if the father is the family’s breadwinner and having him sentenced to jail would only worsen the family situation,” she said

    “There was a mosquito bike case (mat lajak) in Selangor where we decided to take action against the parent under the Child Act 2001

    “So, we want the DPP to impose stern punishment (on parents who allow their children to drive without licences) so that this can serve as a lesson to the community

    So far, underage drivers and those who allow minors to drive their vehicles would only be issued with compounds

    “We have to ensure that if an underage child drives without a licence and someone gets killed (as a result), the parents should be given maximum sentences too

  • WILLIAM AND KATE QUIT LONDON FOR WINDSOR

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/life/2022/08/22/william-and-kate-quit-london-for-windsor/24162

    08/22/2022

    60.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise LONDON, Aug 22 — Prince William and his wife Kate announced today that they will send all three of their children to the same private school after moving their main home to Windsor

    Kensington Palace said that from September third-in-line Prince George, aged nine, Princess Charlotte, seven, and four-year-old Prince Louis will attend Lambrook School, near Ascot in southern England

    The announcement came as the family are shifting their base from their London apartment at Kensington Palace to Adelaide Cottage, in the private Home Park near Windsor Castle, where Queen Elizabeth II lives most of the time

    The family also have a country estate in Norfolk in eastern England and a holiday cottage in Scotland

    George and Charlotte previously went to a school in west London, Thomas’s Battersea

    The move announcement comes as William’s brother Prince Harry and his wife Meghan plan to stay in Frogmore Cottage, a short distance from Adelaide Cottage at Windsor, while visiting the UK to attend charity events in September

    ['london', 'prince', 'child', 'school', 'windsor']

    About Us Advertise LONDON, Aug 22 — Prince William and his wife Kate announced today that they will send all three of their children to the same private school after moving their main home to Windsor

    Kensington Palace said that from September third-in-line Prince George, aged nine, Princess Charlotte, seven, and four-year-old Prince Louis will attend Lambrook School, near Ascot in southern England

    The announcement came as the family are shifting their base from their London apartment at Kensington Palace to Adelaide Cottage, in the private Home Park near Windsor Castle, where Queen Elizabeth II lives most of the time

    The family also have a country estate in Norfolk in eastern England and a holiday cottage in Scotland

    George and Charlotte previously went to a school in west London, Thomas’s Battersea

    The move announcement comes as William’s brother Prince Harry and his wife Meghan plan to stay in Frogmore Cottage, a short distance from Adelaide Cottage at Windsor, while visiting the UK to attend charity events in September

    ['london', 'prince', 'child', 'school', 'windsor']

    64.71% Shortened!

    Ella Yam (left) is the daughter of Shanghai-born model-actress Qi Qi and Hong Kong actor Simon Yam

    Seen as one of the most promising "second-generation stars", as celebrity offspring are called, she has appeared in fashion campaigns as well as on the covers of Hong Kong magazines

    In a post last month, Qi Qi, 54, praised Ella for a campaign she had been a part of to mark the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong's handover to China

    "Model of a new generation in China and Hong Kong," the proud mum wrote in her Weibo post sharing some photos, sparking speculation that Ella will be going full-time when she turns 18

    However, Qi Qi flatly denied it in an exclusive interview with Hong Kong newspaper Sing Tao Daily last week

    "When did I ever announce this?" she said while on holiday in Europe with Ella

  • AMAZON SINGAPORE CURRENTLY OFFERING FREE DELIVERY TO MALAYSIA

    https://www.thestar.com.my/tech/tech-news/2022/08/22/amazon-singapore-currently-offering-free-delivery-to-malaysia

    08/22/2022

    60.0% Shortened!

    Malaysians keen on taking advantage of the free shipping deal will need to check if the all the products in their cart qualify for the promotion

    — Photo by Christian Wiediger on Unsplash Ecommerce giant Amazon is now offering free delivery to Malaysia on their Singaporean website for orders on select items that total up to more than S$40 (RM128.69)

    While Amazon has not specified when the promotion will be ending, the terms and conditions page for the offer does include a mention that if items are not purchased while the campaign is in effect, the free shipping will not be applied

    Malaysians keen on taking advantage of the free shipping deal will need to check if all the products in their cart qualify for the promotion, as according to Amazon, shipping will still be charged on any ineligible products during check out

    Users should keep an eye out for a message saying “Free international delivery if you spend over MYR128.69 on eligible items” (for orders with multiple items) or “FREE international delivery” (for orders consisting of a single item that is already priced above the minimum order value) on product listings that are part of the promotion

    Once the qualifying items are added to the cart and minimum value has been reached, the option for free shipping will be automatically selected during checkout

    ['free', 'shipping', 'product', 'promotion', 'amazon']

    Malaysians keen on taking advantage of the free shipping deal will need to check if the all the products in their cart qualify for the promotion

    While Amazon has not specified when the promotion will be ending, the terms and conditions page for the offer does include a mention that if items are not purchased while the campaign is in effect, the free shipping will not be applied

    Malaysians keen on taking advantage of the free shipping deal will need to check if all the products in their cart qualify for the promotion, as according to Amazon, shipping will still be charged on any ineligible products during check out

    Users should keep an eye out for a message saying “Free international delivery if you spend over MYR128.69 on eligible items” (for orders with multiple items) or “FREE international delivery” (for orders consisting of a single item that is already priced above the minimum order value) on product listings that are part of the promotion

    Once the qualifying items are added to the cart and minimum value has been reached, the option for free shipping will be automatically selected during checkout

  • SUPERMAX PROFITS PLUNGE ON FALLING DEMAND FOR RUBBER GLOVES

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/22/supermax-profits-plunge-on-falling-demand-for-rubber-gloves/

    08/22/2022

    60.0% Shortened!

    Revenue also slipped to RM2.69 billion from RM7.16 billion previously, the company said in a filing with Bursa Malaysia today

    Supermax also reported a lower net profit of RM33.05 million in its fourth quarter ended June 2022, compared with RM962.53 million in the same period last year

    Revenue decreased by 84% to RM300.23 million from RM1.87 billion a year ago

    Supermax expects to see continued major consolidation in the rubber glove industry as prices and demand continue to moderate from the record highs seen at the peak of the pandemic

    However, the structural shift triggered by the pandemic will see demand remain at a higher level compared to the pre-pandemic period and resume a longer-term upward trend once the current demand-supply disequilibrium rebalances in time

    “We are expecting the market to remain weak, competition to be intense and profit margins to continue to moderate,” the company said

    ['supermax', 'million', 'billion', 'year', 'demand']

    Revenue also slipped to RM2.69 billion from RM7.16 billion previously, the company said in a filing with Bursa Malaysia today

    Supermax also reported a lower net profit of RM33.05 million in its fourth quarter ended June 2022, compared with RM962.53 million in the same period last year

    Revenue decreased by 84% to RM300.23 million from RM1.87 billion a year ago

    Supermax expects to see continued major consolidation in the rubber glove industry as prices and demand continue to moderate from the record highs seen at the peak of the pandemic

    However, the structural shift triggered by the pandemic will see demand remain at a higher level compared to the pre-pandemic period and resume a longer-term upward trend once the current demand-supply disequilibrium rebalances in time

    “We are expecting the market to remain weak, competition to be intense and profit margins to continue to moderate,” the company said

    ['supermax', 'million', 'billion', 'year', 'demand']



  • POS MALAYSIA SEES SECOND HALF TO REMAIN CHALLENGING

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/08/22/pos-malaysia-sees-second-half-to-remain-challenging

    08/22/2022

    62.5% Shortened!

    As a result, the postal group will continue to focus on a balanced execution of good customer mix, improving yields, managing costs, whilst delivering a market-leading service, and ensuring an optimum customer experience at every touch point

    Group chief executive officer Charles Brewer said the transformation journey the postal group embarked upon 12 months ago is starting to yield positive results and recognised it still has much to do

    In the second quarter ended June 30, Pos Malaysia posted a smaller net loss of RM5.25mil against a net loss of RM121.84mil a year ago

    Revenue for the period fell 3% to RM517.26mil from RM533.9mil a year prior while loss per share stood at 0.67 sen from 15.57 sen previously

    Pos Malaysia attributed its improved performance to better customer mix and yield, and effective cost management, which resulted in lower transportation and delivery costs.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['po', 'malaysia', 'group', 'brewer', 'year']

    In the second quarter ended June 30, Pos Malaysia posted a smaller net loss of RM5.25mil against a net loss of RM121.84mil a year ago

    Revenue for the period fell 3% to RM517.26mil from RM533.9mil a year prior while loss per share stood at 0.67 sen from 15.57 sen previously

    08/22/2022

    53.85% Shortened!

    Monday, 22 Aug 2022

    Some of them are still open as shophouses, while others already have ‘for sale’ signs out front,” said Patai

    “Authorities should investigate the buildings’ structure to prevent a tragedy from happening.” Phra Khanong district deputy chief Warunluck Pholhan said she had instructed officials to check the structural integrity of the shophouses, measure the angle of tilt, and monitor for cracks or structural weakness

    District officials will also coordinate with the owners of Ture Digital Park and other neighbouring buildings to seek ways to secure the slumping shophouses

    The district will issue an order for immediate demolition if the building is found to be a danger to the public,” she added.

  • SENIOR CITIZEN LOSES RM1.34MIL IN MACAU SCAM

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/21/senior-citizen-loses-rm1-34-mil-in-macau-scam/

    08/21/2022

    45.45% Shortened!

    Acting Muar district police chief Aidil Roneh Abdullah said the woman was contacted by an individual at the end of May, claiming that there was a delivery made to her containing the identification card, automated teller machine (ATM) card and cheque book of another individual and that it was against the law

    Her call was then passed to another individual claiming to be a police officer, who then directed her to disclose her personal banking details for audit purposes and she complied out of fear of having “action” taken against her

    When the victim checked both accounts that she had exposed to the individual on Thursday, she discovered that over RM1.34 million had been transferred out without her knowledge

    She then realised she had been scammed and lodged a police report on Friday, he added

    Grab Malaysia’s #TechuntukSemua initiative integrates the PWD community within the workforce so they can become financially mobile.

    Make it your priority today to navigate life-altering catastrophes you may encounter in your life.

    ['year', 'claim', 'police', 'say', 'individual']

    Acting Muar district police chief Aidil Roneh Abdullah said the woman was contacted by an individual at the end of May, claiming that there was a delivery made to her containing the identification card, automated teller machine (ATM) card and cheque book of another individual and that it was against the law

    Her call was then passed to another individual claiming to be a police officer, who then directed her to disclose her personal banking details for audit purposes and she complied out of fear of having “action” taken against her

    When the victim checked both accounts that she had exposed to the individual on Thursday, she discovered that over RM1.34 million had been transferred out without her knowledge

    She then realised she had been scammed and lodged a police report on Friday, he added

  • COPS DENY CIVILIAN VEHICLES DAMAGED IN CAR CHASE

    https://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2022/08/21/cops-deny-civilian-vehicles-damaged-in-car-chase/

    08/21/2022

    53.85% Shortened!

    Petaling Jaya police chief Fakhruddin Abdul Hamid said the head of the district mobile patrol vehicle unit had lodged a report denying the social media posting that allegedly sullied the image of the police force

    He said police were also urging the owner of the Twitter account “zulisfine” to come forward to assist in the probe into the matter

    In the posting, the writer had claimed that the police patrol cars were driven recklessly in SS2 here at 11.30am and had hit several other vehicles

    Fakhruddin said the mobile patrol unit denied that the police vehicles had hit other cars as alleged, adding that there were no scratch marks on the patrol cars

    The driver and front passenger of the car tried to escape but were arrested,” he said

    Fakhruddin said besides the two local men, police also arrested eight men and a woman, aged 22 to 43, who were in the car

    ['police', 'deny', 'vehicle', 'chase', 'two']

    64.71% Shortened!

    The former deputy home minister, who was Pulai MP from 2004 to 2018, took to Facebook in response to a jibe from the human resources minister on his inability to retain the seat in the last general election (GE14)

    Saravanan responded by calling Nur Jazlan “delusional”

    In a Facebook post, Nur Jazlan said he was willing to give others the opportunity to contest in Pulai as he felt he could no longer deliver a BN victory there

    “Therefore, I am honoured to invite the human resources minister (Saravanan) to contest in Pulai, a seat that I see as being racially balanced,” Nur Jazlan said

    “This invitation is in line with the request from the MIC president who wanted (to contest in) 12 parliamentary seats in GE15

    “I am sure he (Saravanan) will be celebrated as a hero, like in the Tamil film ‘Bahubali’, if he wins the seat, and I will salute him as well,” Nur Jazlan said

    ['mic', 'contest', 'pulai', 'seat', 'say']

  • YOURSAY | BANNED FOR LIFE - THE DAY M'SIAN HUMOUR DIED

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/632834

    08/21/2022

    80.65% Shortened!

    You should open a comedy club yourself

    The owner of Crackhouse Comedy Club can challenge the ban in court and will surely succeed

    Besides, what is the basis for the ban when the owner is fighting the criminal charge against him in court? Even if found guilty, there is still no basis in law for DBKL to ban someone for life

    My other comment is that DBKL seems to have forgotten that it is there to serve the people living in the city for all their different needs

    But banned for life for doing any business? That is an immense power for an organisation to hold; even the Agong, prime minister and the courts do not have such power

    For what? For doing comedy and making people laugh

    ['life', 'dbkl', 'owner', 'city', 'ban']
